For the past few years, Sarala has been engaged in the activity of selling cow's milk in her village to give financial support to her family and husband. She is determined to expand her business so as to provide more financial assistance to her family.

So she has taken a loan from Kiva’s partner BJS to purchase one more cow, so that she can sell more milk to her customers and meet their demands.  Sarala is a very responsible and ambitious woman. She hopes to earn an additional profit to give a better life to her family and educate her children properly.

Sarala is very much grateful to Kiva and BJS to make her dreams successful.

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow to expand her existing dairy business.

loans.name: Jose Edenilson

texts.es: José tiene 41 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos de 4 años y 6 años de edad. José se dedica a la prestación de servicios seguridad. Tiene 5 años de dedicarse a este trabajo y es así como junto as su compañera de vida quien se dedica a la venta de tamales mantienen la economía del hogar. José solicita este crédito a FUSAI dado que desea construir un cuarto para la cocina para lo cual necesita comprar materiales como: lámina galvanizada, ladrillo, cemento, arena, etc.
texts.en: Jose is 41 years old and lives with his life’s partner and two children, ages 4 and 6.  He owns his home.  Jose provides security services and has been doing this for five years.  This is how he met his partner, who sells tamales and they support the household together.  Jose is asking for this loan, through FUSAI, in order to build a kitchen.  He needs to buy supplies, such as galvanized metal, bricks, cement, sand, etc.

loans.use: to build a kitchen.

loans.name: Zevarmo

texts.ru: Зевармо жизнерадостная женщина. Она живет в южной части Таджикистана вместе со своей семьей. Зевармо и ее муж воспитывают 3 детей. Двое из них не совершеннолетние. Зевармо имеет медицинское образование. Она работает более 19 лет в детском садике медсестрой. Она очень любит маленьких детей и ей комфортно работать среди маленьких детей. Она очень любит свою работу и считает, что ее профессия очень полезная для людей. У Зевармо последнее время очень болят зубы и она должна лечить зубы. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для лечения зубов. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Zevarmo is a happy woman.  She lives in southern Tajikistan with her family.  She and her husband are raising three children, two of whom are still minors.  Zevarmo has a medical background, and for more than 19 years now, she's been working as a preschool nurse.  She loves small children and enjoys working with them very much.  She loves her job and believes that her profession is a very useful one.  Zevarmo has recently experienced a lot of pain with her teeth and she needs dental treatment.  She is taking a loan of 5,000 somoni to get this done.  She is awaiting your kindness and relying on your generosity.

loans.use: to pay for dental treatment.

loans.name: San Francisco Group

texts.es:
El grupo San Francisco está en su ciclo número 1 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan para salir adelante, es un grupo nuevo que tiene las expectativas de poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
La Sra. Gricelda es la presidenta de este grupo, se dedica a la venta de comidas varias, que ella misma hace y que después sale a vender de manera ambulante. Ya se hizo de muy buena clientela, es muy conocida por el barrio por sus ricas comidas.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de más ingredientes tales como: huevo, verduras, carne, disco para empanada y otros para poder hacer sus comidas como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe, que le ayudará a poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
The San Francisco group is in its first cycle in the committee for women program, where they all work and help one another get ahead.  This is a new group that hopes to improve its members’ and their families’ living conditions.

Gricelda serves as the group’s president and sells various types of food that she prepares herself.  She sells on foot and is very well known in the neighborhood because of her delicious foods.

She is asking for this loan to buy ingredients such as eggs, vegetables, meat, empanada dough and other things to prepare and sell her foods.  She is grateful for the opportunity and it will help her continue with her work.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Suyumkan

texts.ru: Суюмкан 44 года, не замужем, имеет 2 детей, старший сын уехал на заработки, дочь - школьница. Образование у Суюмкан средне-специальное, она очень ответственная и предприимчивая. С 1992 года занимается животноводством. На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве Суюмкан есть 4 коровы и 10 овец. Ее ежемесячная прибыль около 20,000 сом (KGS). Суюмкан является одним из трех членов группы "Эленур". Она обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку бычков и овец. Доходы от кредита Суюмкан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота, а также в будущем хочет сделать дома ремонт.
texts.en: Suyumkan is 44 years old, single, and the mother of two children.  Her oldest son is already working and has left home; her daughter is still in school.  Suyumkan has a specialized-secondary education.  She is very responsible and enterprising.  She has been involved in animal husbandry since 1992 and currently owns four cows and 10 sheep.  She makes a monthly income of close to 20,000 (KGS).  Suyumkan is the member of a group named "Elenur", which consists of three people.  She has turned to the bank Bai Tushum and requested a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of young bulls and sheep.  She is planning to reinvest the earnings from her loan into further increasing her herd.  In the future, she would also like to repair her house.

loans.use: to buy additional bulls and sheep for fattening and resale.

loans.name: Ismael

texts.en:
Ismael is a 21-year-old, self-dependent young man.  He lives in Irbid, Jordan with his family which consists of seven members. 

He is a university student majoring in Business Administration, and is in his third year. He also works in the evenings as a photographer to help his family financially. Ismael is seeking to get his Bachelor degree in order to find a better job in his field of study. 

He has applied for this loan because he doesn't have enough money to pay for his upcoming semester's tuition fees.

loans.use: To pay for his upcoming tuition fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first solar hybrid smart electricity grid.

loans.name: Sameera

texts.en:
Sameera is 55 years old and married. Her husband works as a truck driver.  His income wasn't covering his children needs so Sameera has started her own business.  

For the past eight months, she has been selling clothes at her house and doing embroidery. Because her business is profitable, she is planning to expand it in the future by opening her own clothes store to raise her profit. 

Now she is seeking a loan to buy a new collection of clothes for the upcoming season in addition to some embroidery tools.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes and embroidery tools for her business.

loans.name: Jose Alberto

texts.es:
José Alberto tiene 20 años de edad, vive en casa familiar, con sus padres, no cuenta con ningún hijo en su poder. Él vive por más de 9 años en el distrito de Pucará, provincia de Jaén, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú, en la parte rural de este distrito contando con servicios de agua y luz. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

La actividad que realiza José Alberto es el transporte de pasajeros por mototaxi, cuenta con clientela reconocida de la zona cuenta tiene ya varios años dedicándose a este rubro, cuenta con movilidad propia, además se dedica a brindar servicio de construcción ingresos adicionales que le permiten solventar el crédito sin ningún problema.

El destino del crédito será para invertir en en los arreglos de su mototaxi, para poder asegurar el correcto funcionamiento de su herramienta de trabajo, lo que le permitirá seguir obteniedo ingresos y así poder mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jose Alberto is 20 years old and lives with his parents.  He doesn’t have any children.  He has been living in the Pucara district, within the Jaen province, and Cajamarca region in northern Peru for more than nine years.  This area has electricity and running water.  His is basically a farming, livestock, and merchant community.

Jose Alberto has his own moto-taxi and transports local passengers.  He says that he’s been doing this for several years.  He also works in construction, which provides an additional income that will allow him to repay the loan with no problems.

He will use the money from this loan to make some repairs to his moto-taxi so that his work equipment works properly.  This will allow him to continue earning an income and improving his quality of life.

loans.use: to repair his moto-taxi.

loans.name: Zhanylbek

texts.ru: Жанылбек, 23 года, не женат, детей нет, живет с родителями. У Жанылбека - среднее образование, он оптимистичный и очень ответственный. Уже несколько лет сам занимается животноводством, раньше всегда помогал родителям, так и научился вести бизнес. В хозяйстве Жанылбека есть 16 овец, 5 коров и 1 лошадь. Ежемесячная прибыль Жанылбека составляет около 20,000 сом (KGS). Он является участником группы "Эленур", всего в группе состоит 3 человека. Жанылбек решил обратиться в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец и бычков. Доходы от кредита он планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Zhanylbek is 23 years old, single with no children, and he still lives with his parents.  He has a secondary education.  He is optimistic and very responsible.  He has had his own animal husbandry business for a few years already, and before that he used to help his parents.  It is from them that he learned the business.  Zhanylbek currently owns 16 sheep, five cows and one horse.  He makes a monthly income of close to 20,000 som (KGS).  He is a member of the "Elenur" group, which consists of three people in total.  He decided to contact the Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS).  He will use his loan to buy sheep and young bulls.  He is planning to re-invest the earnings from his loan into further expanding his herd.

loans.use: to purchase sheep and young bulls in order to grow his business.

loans.name: Tuhsuluv

texts.ru: Тухсулув добрая женщина из Таджикистана. Она живет вместе со своими 5 детьми и мужем в сельской местности. Тухсулув занимается выращиванием картошки и кукурузы. Она продает полученный урожай на местном рынке. Тухсулув этим бизнесом занимается уже более 15 лет. Ей помогают дети и муж введению бизнеса. Тухсулув планирует развевать бизнес дальше и получать больше дохода. Она работает с раннего утра до позднего вечера и из-за тяжелого труда она последнее время болеет. Ей необходимо срочно лечится. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 сомони для покупки лекарства для лечения. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Tuhsuluv is a kind woman from Tajikistan. She lives with her husband and her five children in a rural area. For more than 15 years now, she has been growing potatoes and corn and reselling her crops at the local market.  Her husband and children help her to run the business.  Tuhsuluv wants to further grow her business and increase her income.  She works from dawn until late in the evening, and because she works so hard, she has recently become ill.  She needs urgent medical care.  She is taking a loan of 1,000 somoni to buy the medications she needs for her treatment.  She is awaiting your kindness and relying on your generosity.

loans.use: to buy the medications she needs for her treatment.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her son's operation

loans.name: Sadbarg

texts.ru: Садбарг родилась в 1985 году. Она заботливая мать 2 детей. Садбарг имеет 2 детей. Мустафо и Мустаким. Она одна воспитывает своих детей, так как она разведена. Она занимается более года купле продажей продуктов питания. Ее лавка находится у нее дома и многими ее покупателями являются соседи. Садбарг также изготавливает пирожки, хот-доги и продает местным жителям. Она имеет регулярных покупателей, так как она продает высококачественные продукты питания. Садбарг решила расширить ассортимент товара и с такой целью она обратилась за займом в сумме 2000 сомони для покупки продуктов питания. Он ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Sadbarg was born in 1985.  She is the caring mother of two children, Mustafo and Mustakim, whom she raises by herself because she is divorced.  For more than a year now, she has been buying and selling food products.  She has her own store at home and many of her customers happen to be her neighbors.  Sadbarg also prepares pies and hot-dogs, which she resells to the local residents.  Since she sells high quality food products, she has some regular customers.  She has decided to increase her inventory, and with this goal in mind, she has requested a loan of 2,000 somoni for the purchase of food products.  She is awaiting your kindness and relying on your generosity.

loans.use: to buy food products to increase her working capital.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first solar hybrid smart electricity grid.

loans.name: Bumaria

texts.ru: Бумария, 48 лет, замужем, мать 3 детей (1 сын и 2 дочери). Образование-среднее, с 1999 года занимается животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду и терпеливому характеру Бумарии, на сегодняшний день она имеет хорошее хозяйство: 3 коровы и 1 лошадь. Ежемесячная прибыль Бумарии составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Бумария обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров стоимостью примерно 15,000 сом (KGS) каждая. Доходы от кредита Бумария планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение количества скота, что позволит ей улучшить благосостояние семьи.
texts.en: Bumaria is 48 years old, married, and the mother of three children (one son and two daughters).  She has a secondary education and has been involved in animal husbandry since 1999.  Thanks to her very hard work and patient nature, she has grown her business and she currently owns three cows and one horse.  She makes a monthly income of 10,000 som (KGS).  In order to further develop her business, she has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS).  She will use this loan to buy cows priced at about 15,000 som (KGS) each.  Bumaria plans to reinvest the earnings from her loan into further increasing her livestock headcount, which will allow her to improve her family's welfare.

loans.use: to purchase additional cows in order to grow her business.

loans.name: Salam

texts.en:
Salam is a 32 year old, married woman who has been trying her best to cover her family needs by helping her husband financially. 

Her husband works at a supermarket and Salam has started her own business to be the second provider for the family. For the past two years, her business has been selling clothes at her house. Because she started receiving more requests from her customers, she is now seeking to purchase a new collection of clothes which will suit the upcoming winter season. Since she doesn't have enough money for that, she has applied for this loan.

In the future, she is aiming to open her own clothing store to raise her income.

loans.use: to purchase a new collection of clothes to sell

loans.name: Sumsarkan

texts.ru: Сумсаркан успешно погасила предыдущий кредит и использовала его по назначению. Она очень благодарна Фонду Кива и всем инвесторам, помогшим ей с финансированием. На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве Сумсаркан есть 5 коров, 4 теленка и 20 овец. Ее ежемесячная прибыль от продажи молока, молочных продуктов и скота составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Сумсаркан обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку телят и овец.  Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение количества домашней скотины, чтобы иметь возможность накопить средства на покупку дома для сына.
texts.en: Sumsarkan successfully repaid her previous loan and used it as intended.  She is very grateful to Kiva and to all the lenders who helped her financially.  Sumsarkan now owns five cows, four calves and 20 sheep.  She makes a monthly income of close to 10,000 som (KGS) from the sale of milk, milk products and livestock.  In order to further develop her business, she has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS).  She will use her loan to buy calves and sheep.  She plans to reinvest the earnings from her loan into further increasing her livestock headcount, which will allow her to save money toward the purchase of a house for her son.

loans.use: to purchase calves and sheep in order to increase her farm's livestock headcount.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first solar-hybrid smart electricity grid.

loans.name: Jacinta

texts.en: Jacinta is 41 years old and the mother of four children. She owns and operates a small bakery where earns a living by making pancakes, pork cakes, and buns and sells them to people in her community. She has been doing this for more than two years and is requesting a loan to buy supplies, including a bag of flour, a bag of sugar, a bottle of vegetable oil, plastic bags, a box of chicken, a bottle of mushroom sauce, a fry pan and wooden spoon, and bag of yeast. Jacinta hopes to use her profits to expand business and to meet her family's everyday needs. She became a member of SPBD in 2011 in order to gain access to capital for her business.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her business.

loans.name: Taele

texts.en: Taele is 43 years old and the mother of seven children. She earns a living by operating a small convenience store in her village. She began doing this last year to earn a living and provide for her family's everyday needs. Taele has requested a loan to buy boxes of chicken, a sack of sugar, a sack of rice, a sack of flour, and boxes of milk to use in her business. She will use her profits to expand her business. She joined SPBD in 2014.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her business.

loans.name: Amilaina

texts.en: Amilaina is a 30-year-old mother with two children. She owns and operates a small vegetable garden (cabbage, cucumber, and eggplant). She sells the vegetables in her community to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than two years. Amilaina requested a loan to buy vegetable seeds, a rake, a wheel barrow, a water tank, and a knife to assist her in running the business. She hopes to use her profits to expand her small business and provide for her family's everyday needs. She joined SPBD in 2014.

loans.use: to buy vegetable seeds, a rake, a wheel barrow, a water tank, and a knife

loans.name: Carlos Antonio

texts.es:
El Sr Carlos Antonio Labora reparando llantas de automoviles en una empresa reencauchadora desde hace 9 años trabajo con el cual a sacado a su familia adelante dondele estabilidad economica asi como una mejor educacion.
el Sr Carlos Antonio esta necesitando un prestamo ya que su esposa se encuentra enferma y necesita hacerle unos examenes medicos asi como sufragar gastos de medicina y compra de medicamentos.
texts.en:
Carlos Antonio has been repairing tires in a tire retreading company for 9 years. He has supported  his family with this work, providing them with economic stability as well as a good education.

Carlos Antonio needs a loan because his wife is ill and needs to undergo some medical tests. He also needs to pay for drugs and medicines.

loans.use: to buy medicine and pay for medical consultations.

loans.name: Susana

texts.en: Susana is 19 years old and earns a living by running a small plantation where she grows taro and bananas.  She has been doing this for several years, and is requesting a loan to buy supplies, including a knife, wheelbarrow, water tank, rake, taro roots, banana roots and safety boots. She joined SPBD earlier this year and will use her profits to expand her business and provide for her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her business.

loans.name: Sara

texts.en: Sara is a 40-year-old mother with one child. She owns and operates a small convenience store in her village to earn a living. She has been doing this since 2013. Sara requested a loan to buy a box of chicken, a box of canned fish, a sack of rice, a sack of sugar, and a box of milk to help her run the business. She hopes to use her profit to expand her business and provide for her family's everyday needs. She became a member of SPBD in 2014.

loans.use: to buy a box of chicken, a box of canned fish, a sack of rice, a sack of sugar, and a box of milk

loans.name: Tali

texts.en: Tali is a 28-year-old mother with three children. She has a small garden where she grows vegetables that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for two years. Tali requested a loan to buy vegetable seeds, a rake, a wheelbarrow, hand gloves, water tanks, and safety boots. She joined SPBD in 2014. Tali hopes to use her business profit to expand her business and provide for her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy vegetable seeds, a rake, a wheelbarrow, hand gloves, water tanks, and safety boots

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first solar-hybrid smart electricity grid.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first solar hybrid smart electricity grid.

loans.name: Esneyda Del Carmen

texts.es:
La Sra Esneyda del Carmen Labora Como Enfermera en un Hospital Publico desde hace 27 años, inicia su jornada laborar a las 6:00 am atendiendo a un sinnumeros de pacientes que visitan el hospital el cual vienen de muchas comunidades, terminando sus Labores a las 5:00 pm.
La sra Esneyda Producto de su extensa  jornadas laborar ya hay dias donde hace turnos de 12 horas, necesita este credito ya que su medico de cabecera le esta mandando hacerse unos examenes que su seguro medico no le cubre, por lo que se acerco a kyva y ceprodel a solicitar un prestamo la la realizacion de dichos examenes y asi mejorar su salud.
texts.en:
Señora Esneyda del Carmen has been a nurse in a public hospital for 27 years. She begins working at 6:00 a.m., caring for the crowds of patients who come to the hospital from many nearby towns. The workday usually ends at 5:00 p.m., but sometimes there are so many patients that her shift lasts another hour, until 6:00 p.m. 

Many years of hard work have taken a toll, and Señora Esneyda del Carmen's treating physician has ordered some tests that her medical insurance doesn't cover. She therefore  recently approached Kiva and Ceprodel to apply for a loan to pay for the tests her doctor wants to her to have, and thus improve her health.

loans.use: to pay medical expenses and purchase medicines.

loans.name: Sebastian

texts.es:
Sebastian tiene 69 años de edad, su estado civil es soltero, reside en el distrito de Morropón, natural de la zona, vive en casa propia, junto a su familia. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila y se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería, además del comercio. Su comunidad está ubicada en el distrito y provincia de Morropón, región de Piura, costa norte de Perú.

La actividad a la que se dedica Sebastian es a la venta de cerveza, en su domicilio, además de trabajar como cuidador en un hotel de Morropón por las noches, y además recibe pensión de jubilación por la ONP. Sebastian cuenta con más de 7 años en negocio de cerveza, y cuenta con clientela fija a quien entrega cerveza al por mayor y menor; tiene buenas referencias laborales y personales en la zona donde vive. El destino del crédito será para la compra de cerveza capital de trabajo(compra de cerveza y cascos en una mayor cantidad) para poder atender toda la demanda que tiene en su localidad lo que le va a permitir crecer con su negocio, obtener mayores ingresos, mejores ganancias y por ende una mejora en su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sebastian is 69 years old, his marital status is single, he lives in the district of Morropon, is native to the area and lives in his own home with his family. Life in the community is calm and they earn a living from farming and cattle raising, in addition to trade. His community is located in the district and province of Morropon, Piura region, northern coast of Peru.

The business that Sebastian earns a living from is the sale of beer, from his home, in addition to working as a guard at night at a hotel in Morropon. He also receives a retirement pension from ONP. Sebastian has more than 7 years in the beer business and has fixed customers to whom he delivers beer in bulk and in small quantities. He has good work and personal references in the area where he lives. The purpose of the loan is to buy a supply of beer for work (he buys beer and bottles wholesale) in order to meet all the demand that he has at his business. This will allow him to grow his business, obtain better income, better earnings and in the end, an improvement to his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a supply of beer for work (he buys beer and bottles wholesale).

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first solar hybrid smart electricity grid.

loans.name: Eddy Franco

texts.es:
Eddy Franco tiene 40 años, es conviviente, conocido en el medio, por prestar servicio de alquiler de yuntas. Vive en casa familiar con sus padres, hermanos, con su conyuge e hijo de 14 años, quien estudia en colegio de secundaria de Cojal. Él es una persona con buenas referencias laborales y personales. Su familia es muy unida. Vive en una comunidad habitada por gente amable y respetuosa, que se dedicadan a la agricultura y ganaderia; y está ubicada en el distrito de Cañarís, provincia de Ferreñafe, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Eddy Franco se dedica a prestar servicio de alquiler de yunta, por zona de residencia y alrededores, desde hace más de 14 años aproximadamente. Él necesita préstamo para invertir en construcción de casa, lo que le permitirá vivir de manera independiente con su familia asi darle una mayor comodidad y una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Eddy Franco is 40 years old. He is know in the area for offering a yoke rental service. He live in the family home with his parents, siblings and his wife and 14 year old son. His son goes to the high school in Cojal. He is a person with very good work and personal references. His family is very close. He lives in a community in habited by kind and respectful people who work in agriculture and ranching. It is located in the district of Cañarís, province of Ferreñafe, Lambayeque region, northern coast of Peru.

Eddy Franco works offering a yoke rental service in the area where he lives and in other places. He has don e this for approximately 14 years. He needs a loan to invest in home construction. This will allow him to live independently from his family and give his family more comfort and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in home construction.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Davlatmoh

texts.ru: Давлатмох трудолюбивая женщина. Она родилась в 1962 году. Давлатмох имеет 2 совершеннолетних детей. Им 19 и 26 лет. Давлатмох имеет педагогическое образование. Она работает в средней школе. Давлатмох преподает таджикский язык и литературу. Давлатмох работает в школе более 30 лет. Она опытный преподаватель и воспитала много учеников. Она недавно получила позицию директора школы. Давлатмох всегда старается, чтобы ее дети получили высшее образование. Ее сын учится в университете и поэтому Давлатмох обратилась за займом для оплаты учебного договора. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Davlatmoh is a hard-working woman. She was born in 1962. Davlatmoth has two children who are already of legal age; they are 19 and 26 years old. Davlatmoh has a college degree in education. She works in a secondary school teaching Tajik language and literature. Davlatmoh has been teaching for over 30 years. She is an experienced teacher and has educated many students. Recently she was appointed as the school principal. Davlatmoh always does  all she can in order for her children to receive higher education. Her son is now a university student, which is why Davlatmoh has applied for a loan to pay for his tuition. She is counting on your kindness and hoping for your compassion.

loans.use: to pay for [her son's] tuition.

loans.name: Danny Joel

texts.es:
Danny Joel tiene 37 años de edad, es conviviente, tiene 02 hijos de 12 y 14 años de edad. Vive en casa de sus suegros junto a ellos. Su familia habita en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura, ganaderia y crinza y comercio y está ubicada en el distrito de tumán, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Danny Joel se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales (patos, cerdos y carneros) y brinda servicio de transporte en colectivo como chofer en la ruta rinconazo - tuman desde hace 06 años. Con préstamo realizará compra de animales para negociar, lo que le permitirá aumentar y diversificar su stock de animales para poder así ofrecer una mejor atención a sus clientes satisfaciendo todos los gustos y preferencias de su público consumidor, obteniendo mayores ingresos, mejores ganancias y por ende una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Danny Joel is 37 years old. He is in a common law marriage, and has 2 children, aged 12 and 14. He lives in his parents in law's house with them. His family lives in a community where people work as merchants, and in agriculture, ranching and animal raising. It is located in the district of Tumán, province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru.

Danny Joel works raising and selling animals (ducks, pigs and calves). He also offers transportation service, working as a driver on the bus route between Rinconazo - Tuman for 6 years. With the loan he will buy animals for his business. This will allow him to increase and diversify his livestock so he can offer his customers better service by meeting all of their tastes and preferences. He will obtain more income, better earnings, and therefore a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy animals for his business, which will allow him to increase and diversify his livestock.

loans.name: Shamshod

texts.ru: Шамшод умный молодой человек. Ему 20 лет. Он не женат и живет с родителями. Шамшод в средней школе успешно и получал хорошие оценки. Он в 2011 году окончил среднюю школу и поступил в подготовительный курс в Национальном Университете Таджикистана. Он учился 1 год. В 2013 году он поступил на первый курс данного университета. Шамшод начитанный человек. Он в основном читает современную литературу. Шамшод обратился в ИМОН за займом с целью получения займа для оплаты учебного договора. Он ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Shashod is an intelligent young man. He is 20 years old. He is single and lives with his parents. Shamshod was a strong student in high school and got good grates. In 2011, he graduated from high school and was admitted to the preparatory division of the National University of Tajikistan. He studies there for one year. In 2013 he was admitted to his first year of studies at the university. Shamshod is a well-read person. He mostly reads contemporary fiction. Shamshod has applied to Imon for a loan in order to pay for his tuition. He is counting on your kindness and hoping for your compassion.

loans.use: to pay tuition.

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es: José tiene 36 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 5 años y 3 años de edad. José se dedica a la agricultura y además, trabaja como albañil cuando sus clientes solicitan sus servicios. José desea dar mayor seguridad a su familia para lo cual desea coloacar puertas y ventanas a su vienda. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de puertas y ventanas para colocarlas lo antes posible.
texts.en: José is 36 years old. He lives in his own house with his life's companion and their two children, aged 5 and 3. José works in agriculture and he also works as a bricklayer when his customers ask for his services. José wants to give his family more security so he wants to put doors and windows on his house. Because of this, he is asking for this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying doors and windows to put them on as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy doors and windows for his house.

loans.name: Madres Trabajadoras Group

texts.es:
El grupo se llama Madres Trabajadoras está en su ciclo número 2° del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde 11 integrantes se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, y deben ser capacitadas para poder trabajar.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Rosalina, quien se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, es una mujer muy sacrificada que se está esmerando por poder salir adelante  ya que por medio de su trabajo quiere poder ayudar a su familia y a sus seres queridos.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de frutas y verduras ya que de esa forma podrá seguir con sus ventas y luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
The “Madres Trabajadoras”  group is in its 2nd cycle with the Women’s Communal Bank Program, in which all the women work and help themselves to move forward. They are completing the Elimination of Poverty Survey, in which 11 of the members find themselves below the poverty line and in need of training in order to be able to work.

One of the members, Señora Rosalina, sells fruits and vegetables. She is a very selfless woman who is working very hard so that she can get ahead, as she wants to be able to help her family and her loved ones by means of her work.

She is requesting this loan so that she will be able to buy fruits and vegetables, as that is the way that she will be able to continue her sales, and continue fighting to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Aminahan

texts.ru: Аминахан 58 лет, замужем, есть 3 детей. У Аминахан - среднее образование, в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав в 1991 году, благодаря упорному труду Аминахан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 2 коровы и земельный надел мерою 0,72 ГА, на котором она выращивает рис для реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Аминахан обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 35,000 сом (KGS) на сбор урожая, часть средств будет потрачена на покупку скота. Доходы от кредита Аминахан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Aminahan is 58 years old, married, and the mother of three children.  She has a secondary education and is involved in animal husbandry and agriculture, two activities which constitute an additional source of income for her family.  She started in this field in 1991.  She has worked very hard over the years and she currently owns two cows as well as 0.72 hectare of land on which she grows rice for resale.  She makes a monthly income of 15,000 som (KGS).  In order to further develop her business, she has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 35,000 som (KGS).  She will use her loan primarily to harvest rice and also to buy livestock.  Aminahan is planning to re-invest the earnings from her loan into further increasing her livestock headcount.

loans.use: to harvest rice and buy additional livestock.

loans.name: Nigora

texts.ru: Нигоре 32 года. Она проживает на районе Спитамен. Она верная жена и заботливая мама. У Нигоры трое детей. Ее муж работает шофером. Дети Нигоры подросли, и у нее теперь имеется больше времени. Она хочет работать и зарабатывать, но бросить домашние дела и воспитание детей она не может, к тому же найти работу нелегко. Нигора решила начать собственный бизнес. Она будет заниматься куплей и продажей скотин у себя дома. В Таджикистане многие занимаются сельскохозяйственными деятельностями, и Нигора хочет быть в их числе. Она планирует для начала купить не большое количество скотин и корма для них и постепенно развивать бизнес. Нигора  намерена на заемные деньги приобрести скотин и корм. Нигора надеется, что у нее получиться начать новый бизнес и принести в дом новый источник дохода, чтобы помочь мужу обеспечить семью.
texts.en: Nigora is 32 years old. She lives in Spitamen. She is a faithful wife and loving mother. Nigora has three children. Her husband works as a driver. Nigora's children have gotten older, and now she has more time. She wants to work and earn money, but she cannot give up her housework and child care. Moreover, finding a job is not easy. Nigora decided to start her own business. She will buy and sell cattle from her home. In Tajikistan, many people work in agriculture, and she would like to be one of them. She plans to start by buying a small number of cattle and feed for them, and then gradually develop the business. Nigora is borrowing money to buy cattle and feed. Nigora hopes that she'll be successful starting a new business and will be able to bring in a new source of income to help her husband to provide for the family.

loans.use: buy cattle and feed to start a new business.

loans.name: Saodatjon

texts.ru: Саодатчону 44 года. Она замужем. Ее мужа зовут Умарчон и он работает механиком. Саодатчон и ее муж на воспитании имеют двоих детей. Их дочь Махфуза замужем. Она работает в частной фирме. Она очень успешный работник, но ее зарплата не хватает, чтобы оплатит за учебу сына в университете. Ее сын в этом году поступил в Медицинский Университет Таджикистана. Он успешно окончил среднюю школу и  будущим хочет стать хирургом. Саодатчон запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 долларов США для оплаты годового договора университета, где учится ее сын. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Saodatjon is 44 years old. She is married. Her husband's name is Umarjon and he works as a mechanic. Saodatjon and her husband have raised two children. Their daughter married a man named Makhfouz. Saodatjon works for a private firm. She is a very successful employee, but her wages are not enough to pay for her son to study at the university. This year, her son enrolled in the Medical University of Tajikistan. He successfully graduated from high school and, in the future, wants to become a surgeon. Saodatjon is requesting a loan of $1,000 to pay for tuition at the University where her son studies. She's waiting for your kindness.

loans.use: pay for tuition

loans.name: Muminakhon

texts.ru:
Муминахон живет в районе Б.Гафурова города Худжанд. Она замужняя женщина в возрасте 33 лет. У Муминахон двое детей, и сын и дочь - оба школьники. Муж работает в пекарне и занимается там выпечкой и продажей пирожков. Его пекарня расположена на рынке. А Муминахон работает поваром в своей столовой у школы. Ее клиентами являются школьники и учителя. Она шесть лет назад начала свою деятельность и по сей день успешно продвигает его. Вместе с ней в столовой работают еще несколько ее родственников, это их семейный бизнес. 
В данный момент до наступления холодов Муминахон необходимо запастись такими продуктами, как картофель, лук и масло, так как зимой цены на эти продукты повышаются. Для реализации цели Муминахон обратилась за кредитом из-за нехватки собственных средств. Она надеется получить финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Muminakhon lives in the B. Gafurov district of the city of Khujand.  She is 33 years old and married.  She has two children, one son and one daughter, who are both primary school students.  Her husband works in a bakery, at the market, where he bakes and sells pies.  Muminakhon herself works as a cook in a school cafeteria, preparing food for school children and teachers alike.  She has been involved in this activity for six years and she does an excellent job.  A few of her relatives work with her in the cafeteria; it is their family business.  At the moment, Muminakhon needs to stock up on potatoes, onions and butter before the winter, as the price of these products will increase in the coming months.  In order to achieve her goals, Muminakhon is taking a loan, because she doesn't have enough personal means.  She is hoping to receive financial support.

loans.use: to buy potatoes, onions and butter for her school cafeteria, before the winter.

loans.name: Anisakhon

texts.ru: После окончания университета Анисахон поступила в магистратуру. Она поставила себе цель стать известным экономистом. С этой целью она поступила в магистратуру Таджикского Государственного Университета Политики и Бизнеса по специальности Мировая экономика. Она учится на первом курсе в магистратуре. Она очень умная и трудолюбивая женщина. Учиться отлично и активно участвует во всех мероприятиях университета. Анисахон замужем и имеет 2 детей. Ее муж переводчик. Она обратилась в Имон Интернешенл с целью получения займа для оплаты учебы в университете. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: After graduation, Anisakhon entered graduate school. Her goal is to become a well-known economist. To this end, she enrolled in the Master's program at the Tajik State University of Politics and Business, majoring in international economics. She's a first year graduate student. She is very intelligent and hardworking woman. She studies well and is actively involved in all the university's activities. Anisakhon is married and has two children. Her husband is a translator. She turned to Imon International to obtain a loan to pay for her university studies. She's waiting for your kindness.

loans.use: pay for tuition

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first solar hybrid smart electricity grid.

loans.name: Francisca Ismelda

texts.es:
El Grupo de Crédito  Picoaza  se reúne cada quince días en la parroquia Picoaza de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por ser una zona muy comercial, por sus fiestas tradicionales de San Pedro y San Pablo y por la rica cultura histórica que encierran sus montañas.
En este lugar vive la señora Francisca, tiene 50 años de edad está separada y de esta  relación tiene cinco hijos, cuatro ya mayores y la menor de 17 años que recién acabo sus estudios secundarios y es quien aun vive con ella. 
Doña Francisca tiene en su casa una  pequeña tienda de víveres en el cual vende granos como arroz, azúcar, legumbres y ciertas cosas de bazar, trabaja todos los días desde las 8h00 hasta las 20h00, tiene muchos clientes que realizan sus compras en su tienda.
Ella está repitiendo el crédito con la institución, siempre sus ganancias le dan para salir adelante y con lo que le quedo extra ella pudo aumentar su negocio ya que cada vez hay más productos y quiere tener de todo para satisfacer a sus clientes. Este crédito es para comprar arroz, azúcar y otros víveres. Lleva 4 años en el  Grupo de Crédito  y le gusta porque con los créditos empezó su negocio. Sus sueños son darle la mejor educación a su hija.
texts.en:
Every 15 days, the group called "Grupo de Crédito Picoaza" meets in the Picoaza neighborhood, located in the city of Portoviejo.  This is a very commercial part of the city and is known for its traditional festivities and for its rich historical culture that is found in the mountains.

This is where Francisca lives.  She is 50 years old and she is divorced. She has five children. Four are now adults and her youngest is 17 years old. The youngest, her daughter, just finished high school and lives with her.

Francisco has a small store in her house.  She sells staples such as rice, sugar, beans, and various handicrafts. She works every day from 8 AM until 8 PM.  She has a lot of customers that buy everything they need from her store.

She is seeking another loan from the institution. Her income always goes to getting by and with the extra money from this loan she can focus on growing her business. There are always more products that she can stock and she wants to have everything needed to satisfy her customers.  This loan will be used to buy rice, sugar, and other staples.

She has belonged to this group for 4 years and she likes it because she was able to start her business thanks to the first loan she received. She dreams to provide a better education for her daughter.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, and other provisions.

loans.name: Obedier

texts.en: Obedier is a 53-year-old mother of three. She is a farmer and lives in a small house in Les Anglais, in southern Haiti. This loan helps Obedier get connected to her local prepay microgrid. Obedier is seeking a loan from Kiva lenders to be able to connect to the local solar-powered microgrid and to complete her small solar lantern to get light in her house. Mainly, she worries that regular kerosene use is harming her and her family’s long-term health. Obedier and her family will now be able to benefit from a reliable, durable, and clean power source. After running pilots since 2012 that proved the benefits of prepay quality electricity to people in Les Anglais (first with 14 households, and up to 54), EarthSpark International is developing a full-scale, solar-powered microgrid. This micro-grid is expected to meet the needs of up to 500 households. Kiva loans allow EarthSpark to increase the number of beneficiaries by reducing the up-front costs for customers, and will be repaid over time by electricity sales. To see a video of Les Anglais and the hybrid solar grid, please click here.

loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first solar hybrid smart electricity grid.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first solar hybrid smart electricity grid.

loans.name: Sothea

texts.en:
Sothea, who is 36 years old, is residing in Kang Meas District, Kampong Cham Province of Cambodia. He has only one child who is currently in school. To make a living and support his family, he manages and operates a farming business, growing rice and selling the crop to the local dealers. So far, he has been in this career for sixteen years. The net profit that he can make is USD 2.50 per day, on average.  

Currently, Sothea would like to request a Kiva loan via HKL to buy a motorbike. He would like to thank all lenders for their financial support. He is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike

loans.name: Georgina Magdalena

texts.es:
El Grupo de Crédito  Picoaza  se reúne cada quince días en la parroquia Picoaza de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por ser una zona muy comercial, por sus fiestas tradicionales de San Pedro y San Pablo y por la rica cultura histórica que encierran sus montañas.
En este lugar vive la señora Georgina, tiene 31 años de edad, está separada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 14, 13 y 6 años, los dos mayores  estudian en colegio y el menor en escuela. 
Doña Georgina se dedica a la venta de productos por catálogos de Avon, Belcorp, Yanbal (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas), trabaja todos por las  mañanas, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, da crédito y cobra cada 8 días, lleva más de dos años con este negocio.
Ella está repitiendo el crédito con la institución ya que es la única forma que ella tiene para financiar su negocio, sus ganancias le permiten salir adelante y poder darles lo necesario a sus hijos. Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar perfumes, bisutería, cosméticos y cremas. Lleva más de 2 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por el servicio de atención médica que brinda la institución. Sus sueños es darles lo mejor a  sus hijos.
texts.en:
The Picoaza Credit Group meets every fifteen days in the parish of Picoaza in the city of Portoviejo.  It is known for being a very commercial area, for its traditional Saint Peter’s and Saint Paul’s festivals, and for its rich mountain culture. 

Georgina lives here. She is 31 years old and she is separated, but she has three children from this relationship, ages 14, 13, and 6.  The two oldest are studying in high school, and the youngest is in elementary school.

Georgina sells catalog products for Avon, Belcorp, and Yanbal—beauty items, cosmetics, perfume, and ladies’ accessories. She works every morning, making her sales by going door to door, and collecting every 8 days. She has been in this business for more than two years.

She is repeating a loan with the institution, as that is her only means of financing her business. Her earnings allow her to move forward, and enable her to provide her children with what they need.

She is going to use this loan for the purchase of perfumes, trinkets, cosmetics, and crèmes.

She has been in the credit group for more than two years, and she likes it because of the medical care services that the institution provides. Her dreams include giving the best to her children.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, trinkets, cosmetics, and crèmes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first solar hybrid smart electricity grid.

loans.name: Delfina

texts.en:
Delfina lives in Suai, and she is a business woman. Delfina has been involved in business activities since 2013, when she started with her own working capital of $200.  She also has animals such as pigs, chickens and goats. 

Now Delfina is applying for a loan of $ 600 (USD) from Tuba Rai Metin to improve her business. She sells around the market when there is a market day, and she also takes her clothes to sell there.

Delfina is taking this loan because she wants to add to her working capital to buy more clothes such as shorts, pants, skirts, shirts, umbrellas and other clothes to sell.  She is selling clothes because every day she earns a good income. So, she is still happy to do her business. Delfina is happy with the loan that is offered from Tuba Rai Metin for her to have more working capital to buy more clothes.

loans.use: To buy shorts, pants, skirts, shirts, umbrellas and other clothes to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first solar hybrid smart electricity grid.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first solar hybrid smart electricity grid.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first solar hybrid smart electricity grid.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first solar hybrid smart electricity grid.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first solar hybrid smart electricity grid.

loans.name: Augusto

texts.es:
Augusto tiene 34 años de edad, su estado civil es conviviente, tiene 2 hijos, en edad escolar vive en casa propia junto a su cónyuge en el caserío Tierras Duras Alto distrito de La Matanza. La vida en el caserío se desarrolla tranquilamente debido a que no existe peligro alguno, en lo que respecta al negocio u a otra actividad que se desarrolla sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería y crianza de animales. Dicho caserio se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de La Matanza, provincia de Morropón, región de Piura, costa norte de Perú.

La actividad que realiza Augusto es la producción y venta de adobe en el caserío. La actividad la realiza desde hace más de 2 años. El destino del crédito será para realizar mejoras de su vivienda. El mercado presenta buenas perspectivas debido a que el producto es muy comercial en la zona. Piensa trabajar otorgando buen servicio en base a un buen producto, e incrementando sus ventas.
texts.en:
Augusto is 34 years old. He lives with is partner and has 2 children who are of school age. He lives in his own house together with his wife in the small town of Tierras Duras Alto, in the district of La Matanza. Life in the town is tranquil, owing to the fact that there is no danger whatsoever for businesses or other economic activies that people engage in. The people of the area work in agriculture, cattle, and raising livestock. The town is located in the district of La Matanza, province of Morropón, region of Piura, on the north coast of Peru.

Augusto's business is the production and sale of adobe bricks in the town. He has been in this business for more than 2 years. He will use the loan to improve his house. The market has shown good prospects because the product sells well in the area. He plans to work at providing good service based on a good product, and inreasing his sales.

loans.use: tp make improvements to his house.

loans.name: Faustin

texts.en:
Faustin has gained a lot of knowledge and experience in the construction sector. He has been working in this sector since he was very young. 

As the owner of Alpha et Omega, he has also built a respected construction enterprise in the north of Port-au-Prince.  The business has provided cement and other construction tools to many retailers. 

The high demand in construction causes a gap in the business current stock that the owner wants to fill. A loan through Zafen will help the business buy more cement to increase its production and services in order to satisfy its clientele.

loans.use: To buy 400 sacks of cement and other construction materials to sell

loans.name: Bulbuli

texts.en:
Bulbuli is 40 years old. She is uneducated, only able to sign her name. Her husband Ramesh, aged 40 years, is a cycle van puller by profession. She is the mother of two sons and one daughter. They all go to a nearby village school. They live in a remote region in Jalpaiguri district.

Her husband struggles hard.  They have a small land which is very fertile and productive, so he has decided to cultivate tea plants on the farmland. The main obstacle is capital.

Bulbuli is also a very hardworking and enterprising lady. Now she is seeking a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to purchase agricultural supplies such as tea saplings, manure, etc. She hopes the business will be a lucrative one as it has a very good demand in the market. So they have chosen this crop to cultivate.

Her goals are to strengthen their family business and economy, and provide better education to her children in renowned schools.

She thanks her lenders for helping her by giving her the loan.

loans.use: To purchase agricultural supplies to cultivate tea plants.

loans.name: Modesto

texts.en:
Modesto is the owner of Best Deal Store Inc. He sells wholesale undergarments and clothing (babies', children's, and women’s) to customers abroad in the Caribbean. “I’m proud to own a business. I’m glittered when people seek my products and prices,” he says. Modesto is originally from the Dominican Republic and supports his wife and children.

As a clothing retailer, Modesto must keep up with customer demands and the seasons. He needs a loan to purchase merchandise for fall and winter. This loan will also help Modesto build his credit and establish more permanent sources of funding so he can purchase merchandise when the opportunity arises. Modesto says, “I am confident that my client base here will continue to grow as well as in the Dominican Republic.”

loans.use: to purchase fall and winter merchandise

loans.name: Camelis

texts.en: This loan helps Camelis get connected to his local prepay microgrid. Camelis is a farmer and lives with his wife and his eleven kids in the town of Les Anglais in southern Haiti. Their brown wooden house has no reliable access to electricity and thus Camelis is forced to use costly and harmful kerosene for lighting. With two of his kids still at school, he wishes they had better light for studying at night. A solar-powered microgrid is being installed in Les Anglais, giving Camelis and his family the opportunity to connect to a higher quality, lower-cost energy source. He is looking forward to being connected as it will allow him to save money. He is seeking a loan from Kiva lenders to cover the upfront cost of connection to the grid, which he will repay through his payments for electricity. An electrical connection dramatically reduces the cost of lighting in towns such as Les Anglais while offering far superior light quality and more generally providing opportunities for people to dramatically improve their quality of life. To see a video of Les Anglais and the hybrid solar grid, please click here.

loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first solar hybrid smart electricity grid.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first solar hybrid smart electricity grid.

loans.name: Marlene

texts.en: This loan helps Marlene get connected to her local prepay microgrid. Marlene lives in the town of Les Anglais in southern Haiti. Her white and blue wooden house has no reliable access to electricity and thus Marlene is forced to use costly and harmful kerosene for lighting. A solar-powered microgrid is being installed in Les Anglais, giving Marlene the opportunity to connect to a higher quality, lower-cost energy source. She worries that regular kerosene use is harming her long-term health. She is seeking a loan from Kiva lenders to cover the upfront cost of connection to the grid, which she will repay through her payments for electricity. An electrical connection dramatically reduces the cost of lighting in towns such as Les Anglais while offering far superior light quality and more generally providing opportunities for people to dramatically improve their quality of life. To see a video of Les Anglais and the hybrid solar grid, please click here.

loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first solar hybrid smart electricity grid.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first solar hybrid smart electricity grid.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first solar hybrid smart electricity grid.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first solar hybrid smart electricity grid.

loans.name: Apredieu

texts.en: This loan helps Apredieu get connected to his local prepay microgrid. Apredieu is a farmer and lives with his wife and his 10 kids in the town of Les Anglais in southern Haiti. Their white and blue wooden house has no reliable access to electricity and thus, Apredieu is forced to use costly and harmful kerosene for lighting. With 10 of his kids still in school, he wishes they had better light for studying at night. A solar-powered microgrid is being installed in Les Anglais, giving Apredieu and his family the opportunity to connect to a higher quality, lower-cost energy source. He is looking forward to being connected as it will allow him to save money. He is seeking a loan from Kiva lenders to cover the upfront cost of connection to the grid, which he will repay through his payments for electricity. An electrical connection dramatically reduces the cost of lighting in towns such as Les Anglais while offering far superior light quality and more generally providing opportunities for people to dramatically improve their quality of life. To see a video of Les Anglais and the hybrid solar grid, please click here.

loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first solar hybrid smart electricity grid.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.en: This loan helps Sonia get connected to her local prepay microgrid. Sonia runs a small business and lives with her husband and her seven kids in the town of Les Anglais in southern Haiti. Their wooden house has no reliable access to electricity and thus Sonia is forced to use costly and harmful kerosene for lighting. With six of her kids still at school, she wishes they had better light for studying at night. A solar-powered microgrid is being installed in Les Anglais, giving Sonia and her family the opportunity to connect to a higher quality, lower-cost energy source. She is looking forward to being connected as it will allow her to save money. She is seeking a loan from Kiva lenders to cover the upfront cost of connection to the grid, which she will repay through her payments for electricity. An electrical connection dramatically reduces the cost of lighting in towns such as Les Anglais while offering far superior light quality and more generally providing opportunities for people to dramatically improve their quality of life. To see a video of Les Anglais and the hybrid solar grid, please click here.

loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first solar hybrid smart electricity grid.

loans.name: Martha Floresmila

texts.es:
En las afueras de Portoviejo, ciudad hermosa de verdes montañas y paisajes  encantadores, encontramos el lugar donde se reúnen cada quince días las socias del Grupo De Crédito San Judas Tadeo.
En este lugar vive la señora Martha, tiene 38 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y de esta relación tiene dos  hijos de 17 y 14 años de edad, los mismos que estudian en colegio. Su esposo es controlador en una cooperativa de transporte interprovincial.
Doña Martha es una mujer que le gusta ganar lo suyo para así salir adelante, ella se dedica al comercio, vende ropa de todo tipo, sabanas, toldos, cortinas,  su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, trabaja todos los días unas dos a tres horas más que todo en las mañanas, deja a crédito a sus clientes y cobra cada 8 días, ella empezó su negocio con el primer crédito que recibió del grupo hace mas de 4 años por lo cual está muy agradecida ya que por los créditos se gana algo por el bien de su familia.
Este crédito es para comprar ropa, sabanas y cortinas ya que tiene algunos encargos. Está en el Grupo De Crédito hace más de 4 años y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos. Sus sueños son tener su casa propia, donde viven es alquilado.
texts.en:
In the outskirts of Portoviejo, a beautiful city of green mountains and enchanting landscapes, we find the place where the members of the San Judas Tadeo Credit Group meet every fifteen days.   

Martha lives in this place; she is 38 years old; she is in a common-law relationship, and this relationship has produced two children who are 17 and 14 years old and who are in school.  Her partner is a controller at an interprovincial transportation cooperative. 

Martha is a woman who likes to earn what she has so she can get ahead.  She works in retail selling all kinds of clothing, sheets, awnings, and curtains.  She sells door to door; she works for two or three hours a day, mainly in the morning; she gives her customers credit and charges them every eight days.  She started her business with the first loan she received from the group over four years ago and she is very thankful for it because the loans are the reason she is earning for her family's wellbeing.  

This loan is to buy clothing, sheets, and curtains, as she has some orders.  She has been in the credit group for over four years and she likes it because the loans are fast.  Her dreams are to have her own home; they rent where they live.

loans.use: to buy clothing, sheets, and curtains

loans.name: Octabio Cruz

texts.es: Octabio de 53 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el tiene un negocio de venta de productos desechables y de primera necesidad desde hace varios años, su negocio esta ubicado en el mercado municipal, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de productos desechables, papel higiénico, sopas, huevos etc. todo por mayor  para continuar con sus ventas y asi tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Octabio is 53 years old and lives in his own home with his wife.  He has had a business selling disposable products and necessity items for several years; his business is located in the municipal market.  He uses his earnings to cover his household expenses.  He is requesting a loan to buy disposable products, toilet paper, soups, eggs, etc. all wholesale to continue with his sales and thereby have better earnings.

loans.use: to buy disposable products, toilet paper, soups, eggs, etc. all wholesale

loans.name: Francisco Antonio

texts.es: Francisco de 52 años de edad se dedica desde hace varios años a la agricultura (siembra maíz y frijol), comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Francisco está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para seguir con sus cultivos y asi darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Francisco is 52 years old and has worked in farming for several years (he plants corn and beans); he sells his produce in the different markets that are located close to his home and uses what he makes from sales to cover some of his household expenses.  Francisco is requesting a loan to buy seed, fertilizers, manures, pest control, etc.  and to improve the land shown in the photograph to move forward with his crops and thereby give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seed, fertilizers, manures, pest control, etc. and to improve his land

loans.name: Adan De Jesus

texts.es: Adán de 30 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijo, el se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 20 años siembra maíz y frijol, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para seguir con sus cultivos y así darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Adán is 30 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and his son.  He has worked in farming for over 20 years; he plants corn and beans.  With the earnings from his sales he is able to cover some of his household expenses.  He is requesting a loan to buy seed, fertilizers, manures, pest control, etc. and to improve the land shown in the photograph so he can move forward with his crops and thereby give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seed, fertilizers, manures, pest control, etc. and to improve his land

loans.name: Sina

texts.en:
Sina, who is 33 years old, is residing in Kang Meas District, Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has three dependent children who are currently in school. To make a living and support her family, she manages and operates a farming business, growing rice and selling the crop to the local dealers. So far, she has been in this career for around twenty years. She can make a net profit of USD 5.00 per day, on average.

Currently, Sina would like to request a Kiva loan via HKL to buy a bicycle. She would like to thank all lenders for the financial support. She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to buy a bicycle.

loans.name: Santos Lucia

texts.es: Doña Santos de 30 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras por mayor su negocio está ubicado en el mercado municipal, tiene mucha clientela, con las ventas que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Doña Santos está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas frutas y verduras por mayor para continuar con sus ventas y asi tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Santos is 30 years old and lives in her own home with her husband.  She sells fruits and vegetables wholesale; her business is located in the municipal market.  She has a lot of clientele; she is able to cover some of her household expenses with her sales.  Santos is requesting a loan to buy more fruits and vegetables wholesale to continue with her sales and thereby have better earnings.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables wholesale

loans.name: Julio

texts.es: Julio de 36 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y sus dos hijastros, el se dedica a la pesca artesanal, contando con una pequeña lancha y algunas redes para obtener mariscos. Él se ha dedicado desde hace 20 años a esta actividad, la cual incluso ahora le permite salir adelante. Julio solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de más redes para pescar, también anzuelos y otros instrumentos necesarios para realizar la pesca diariamente. El  desea darle una mejor vida a su familia en donde puedan contar con todo lo necesario.
texts.en: Julio is 36 years old and lives in his own home with his life partner and his two stepchildren.  He fishes for a living with his small boat and some nets to catch seafood.  He has done this work for 20 years and even now it has allowed him to get ahead.  Julio is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will provide him with the money he needs to buy more nets to fish, as well as hooks and other tools he needs to fish daily.  He wants to give his family a better life where they can have everything they need.

loans.use: to buy more nets to fish, hooks, and other tools

loans.name: Jaya Usaha Baluk Group

texts.en:
Having success with the pigs program, the Jaya Usaha Baluk group agreed to continue their loan and use it for farming. After the last loan, the group sold their pigs and earned a satisfactory profit. They were able to save the money, fullfill their daily needs and purchase new piglets.

Now is the right time to do gardening, although there was no rain until this week. The members of Jaya Usaha Baluk, together with their husbands, started to plant soy beans.

Ni Nengah used her loan to purchase soy bean seeds and fertilizer. She has land behind her house and she works on it with her husband. They also still manage their pigs. They expect a maximum result from both of the businesses. The profit will be saved and used later for capital.

loans.use: to buy soy bean seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Ana

texts.en: Ana lives in Baucau. She is married and has five children. There are seven members in the family including her five children and her husband. Her husband is in agriculture and most of her daily income is from selling fruits and vegetables. She is now applying for a loan of $1,000 from Tuba Rai Metin to improve her business. She is taking this loan to buy more bananas, jackfruit, betel nuts and other things to sell. After she buys the items, she will bring them to the market to sell. Ana has been involved in these business activities since 2013. She started with her own working capital of $150.  She also has animals at her house like goats, pigs and chickens.

loans.use: To buy banana, jackfruit, betel nuts and other things to sell

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice is a 29-year-old married woman and a mother of three children from Ormoc City, Philippines. She earns a living through her sari-sari or retail store business selling various goods and items to the people in her place. Alice has been in the business for more than two years now. Her husband works as a carpenter.

Alice is asking for a loan to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda, beverages, soap, toiletries and rice. Through this loan, Alice will be able to improve her stock, allowing her to sell more to her customers. In the future, Alice hopes to expand her store so that it will generate more revenue required for the needs of the family, especially for her children's schooling.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda, beverages, soap, toiletries and rice

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first solar hybrid smart electricity grid.

loans.name: Leonisa

texts.en:
Leonisa works hard to support five children. She is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

Leonisa requested a PHP 4,600 loan through NWTF in order to buy a solar lamp.

She is getting the solar lamp because she wants to save money by minimizing her kerosene expenses.

Leonisa is aware that by using the solar lamp, she is not only saving money, she is also helping the environment and reducing health and hazard risks to her family.

loans.use: to buy a solar lamp

loans.name: Violeta

texts.en:
As a widowed mother of eight children, Violeta works hard to support her family.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Violeta is borrowing PHP 15000 through NWTF in order to buy more fish to sell for her fish vending business.

Violeta has been sustaining her business activities through her past 22 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Edna

texts.en: Edna is a married woman and a mother of two children from Ormoc City, Leyte. She runs a small sari-sari or retail store business selling different kinds of goods to the people in her place. Her husband is a tricycle driver. Edna is asking for a loan to buy spare parts for the motorcycle like wheels, tire, nuts and bolts and additional stock for her store like canned goods, rice, noodles, soap and toiletries. This loan will enable Edna and her husband to improve their business as well as their income. Furthermore, she wants to save money for the schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for the motorcycle like wheels, tires, nuts and bolts, and additional stock for her store

loans.name: Annaliza

texts.en:
Annaliza is thankful for the financial assistance extended to her as she was able to purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items and products needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help for her children’s education, in their personal, household and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for another 9,000 PHP loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her inventory. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result in better profits. Her profits from the business will definitely help sustain her family’s daily needs and her children’s education expenses. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Annaliza hopes to expand her store so that she could display more items. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and also to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Cyndee

texts.en:
This is Cyndee, 36, a resident of Coron, Palawan City, Philippines. Married to Junie, a driver, has seven children. She manages her household while operating the business. She works hard to augment their income for their daily household needs and for the schooling of her children.

Cyndee has a direct selling business. She sells clothing, footwear, undergarments, cosmetics and other products through the popular direct selling brands like Avon, Natasha and Boardwalk. Dealers buy the products at a lower price than shown on the catalogue for the customers and sell them at a profit. Her regular customers are her neighbors, friends, family and the local community.  She earns a minimum of Php1,500 in sales every week.

To help her sustain her business, she is requesting a Php 10,000 loan which she will use to buy merchandise items and orders of beauty products, ladies’ bags, clothing, toiletries and undergarments for her customers. Filipinos prefer to buy these branded personal goods for their good quality. She is thanking God and you in advance for a good return of her investment and for the financial help that will be given her.   

Cyndee aims to grow her business so she could send her children to the best school possible. She dreams that all of them will finish college and that they live a quiet life. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week, and this is where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for personal products for sale.

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en:
Leonora is 41 years old and married with eight children. Six of her children are in school.

Leonora works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more items like shampoo, snack foods, canned goods and school supplies.

Leonora has borrowed and repaid seven loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for ten years and also earns an income from rice retailing.

Leonora aspires to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more items like shampoo, snack foods, canned goods and school supplies.

loans.name: Genevieve

texts.en: Genevieve is a 27-year-old mother with one child. She runs a small business making pancakes, pork cake, and buns and sells them in her community or at the market to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Genevieve requested a loan to buy a sack of flour, a sack of sugar, a bottle of vegetable oil, yeast, a frying pan, a wooden spoon, and a bottle of mushroom soy sauce to assist her in running the business. She hopes to gain more profit to build a bakery store in the near future and provide for her family's daily needs. She joined SPBD in 2013

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, vegetable oil, yeast, a frying pan, a wooden spoon, and a bottle of mushroom soy sauce

loans.name: Avelina

texts.en:
Avelina is thankful for the financial assistance extended to her, as she was able to buy spare parts, accessories and pay for the maintenance of their jeepney unit. Her earnings were a big help in their personal, household and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for another 30,000 PHP loan to buy spare parts and pay for the maintenance of their jeepney unit. Her profits from her business will definitely help her to sustain their daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Avelina still wants to expand her business and to be able to buy more units of jeepneys. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week, where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for spare parts and maintenance for their jeepney unit.

loans.name: Duong's Group

texts.en:
Mr. Duong, born in 1984, participated in the program in 2011. He lives with his wife and two children in Mai Son district, Son La province.
