His family grows corn and coffee on the family’s land. His family’s income is mainly from these crops. In order to increase the crop’s yield and improve the soil after each harvest, he and his wife need to buy fertilizer for these trees. He hopes to borrow a loan from M7-MFI to help develop his coffee garden more, and for the upcoming harvest, they will have a bumper crop.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for the trees

loans.name: Kucup Mekar Group

texts.en:
The Kucup Mekar Group received a new loan in the same amount as last their last loan. As one of the groups that received the most loans from MUK, the purpose of the group is to become capable of working by themselves in terms of venture capital. The Kucup Mekar group still needs a new loan for their business because they have a strong will to become successful pig breeders. The loan will be used to improve their businesses by purchasing superior piglets or a sow.
 
Ni Ketut is using the loan to buy three superior piglets. She has a plan to maintain them for fattening. Her husband helps her with the business by finding traditional feed such as banana leaves everyday from his garden. With this business, she hopes she can save and renovate her kitchen. 

One member is not in the picture because of illness.

loans.use: to buy three superior piglets

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita is a married woman and a mother of a 19-year-old son from Ormoc City, Leyte. Anita has been engaged in a hog-raising business for several years now. Her husband is a tricycle driver. 

Anita is asking for a loan to buy materials for the tricycle like a spare tire, nuts and bolts, piston, clutch and bearing. Through this, her husband will be able to improve the working condition of the tricycle. Moreover, she wants to save money for future use and expenses.

loans.use: to buy a spare tire, nuts and bolts, piston, clutch and bearing for her husband's tricycle

loans.name: Flor Idalia

texts.es: Flor de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hijas y su esposo, ella se dedica al cultivo de tomates desde hace 12 años, tiene muchos clientes por la calidad del producto y los buenos precios, flor esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con sus cultivo y asi tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Flor is 33 years old and lives in her own home along with her husband and two daughters. She has been growing tomatoes for 12 years. Flor has many customers because of the quality of her product and the good prices.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy compost, pest controls, herbicides, and other supplies so that she can improve the land that is shown in the photograph. Flor can continue growing her crops so that she can have a better income.

loans.use: to buy compost, pest controls, herbicides, and other supplies for growing tomatoes.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
This is Lolita. She previously accessed a 21,000 PHP loan that she utilized to buy gardening materials and supplies needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help with their personal, household and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for a 22,000 PHP loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy gardening materials like wire and baskets and supplies such as seeds and fertilizer needed in her business. Her profits from her business will definitely help her sustain their daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Lolita hopes to have a bigger space where she could place and tend her plants. As a CCT community partner, Lolita attends the group's weekly fellowship* meeting where she also draws strength and inspiration from studying the word of God.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners who gather to study the word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for wire, baskets and supplies such as seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Christina

texts.en:
Christine is married and she works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from rice retailing. Christine is borrowing PHP 50,000 through NWTF in order to buy more groceries to sell for her general store business.

Christine has been sustaining her business activities through her past 33 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cheese, corn, beans, pork skins, tomatoes, and other supplies.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 55 years old and married with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Erlinda has a vegetable vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more vegetables to sell in her food stall.

Erlinda has been in this business for nine years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.en:
Cristina is a married woman and a mother of three children from Ormoc City, Leyte. Cristina is engaged in a food vending business selling home cooked snack foods like sweet potatoes and processed meat like hotdog and sausages.

Cristina is asking for a loan to buy sweet potatoes, hotdogs and sausages. Through this, Cristina will be able to sell more to her customers, thus augmenting her sales and income. In the future, Cristina hopes to make her business sustainable and productive.

loans.use: to buy sweet potatoes, hotdogs and sausages

loans.name: Elena

texts.en:
Elena is a 57-year-old married woman from Leyte, Philippines. She has been engaged in the retail sales of rice for more than 30 years now. This is the source of her income.

Elena is asking for a loan to buy more rice to sell. With this, she will be able to sell more rice to the people in her place. Elena hopes to make her business more sustainable and profitable.

loans.use: to buy more rice to sell

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
Elisa is a 54-year-old married woman and the mother of four children from Ormoc City, Leyte. Elisa has been engaged in the hog raising business for more than a year now. Her husband works as a fisherman.

Elisa is asking for a loan to buy more piglets to raise and feed. With this, she will be able to improve her business as well as her income. In the future, Elisa dreams of expanding her business so that it will generate more revenue.

loans.use: to buy more piglets to raise and feed.

loans.name: Todjiboi

texts.ru: Точибою 58 лет  он женат имеет 4 детей. Живет Точибой в сельской местности неподалёку от города, Всю жизнь он занимается выращиванием мелкого домашнего скота.  Так помогая родителям ухаживая за скотом он вырос сам и теперь этим же трудом содержит свою большую семью. Дети у него подросли и сыновья в поисках работы уехали на заработки. Кроме животноводства Точибой  подрабатывает и тем , что продает фрукты выращенные  в небольшом саду.   Для улучшения финансового положения семьи и  уровня жизни своих детей он хочет  увеличить поголовье скота и приобрести корма, но для этого у него не хватает средств. Точибой хочет взять кредит в банке и  воплотить задуманное в реальность. Он обратился в Арванд в надежде что ему помогут и заранее благодарит за помощь.
texts.en:
Todjiboi is 58 years old, married, and has four children.  His children aren't young any more and his sons have moved away to look for work.  Todjiboi lives in a rural area not far from the city and has been in the cattle business his entire life.  He once helped his parents look after their cattle and now he is in the very same line of work to provide for his own large family.  He earns some extra money by selling fruit that he grows in his small orchard.

In order to improve his financial situation and his children's standard of living, Todjiboi wants to increase the size of his herd and to buy feed, but he doesn't have the financial means to do so.  Todjiboi wants to take out a loan to turn his plans into reality.  He has applied to MDO Arvand, LLC in the hopes that he will find help and thanks you for it in advance.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Atipa

texts.ru: Атипа, 65 лет, замужем, трое взрослых детей, которые проживают отдельно. У Атипы средне-специальное образование, 26 лет назад в качестве дополнительного дохода она занимается сельским хозяйством. У нее в хозяйстве есть 1 корова, 1 лошадь, 20 овец, 1 теленок и 3 нетели, также есть земельный надел размером 0,42 ГА. Атипа известна, как принципиальный, честный, порядочный и надежный человек. На сегодняшний день ее деятельность приносит хорошую ежемесячную прибыль. Для дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Атипа обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 2 коров. Доходы от кредита она планирует использовать для развития своего хозяйства и намерена приобрести дополнительно землю для полеводства.
texts.en:
Atipa is 65 years old, married, and has three grown children who live separately from her.   Atipa is well known as a principled, honest, clean living, and reliable woman.  Atipa has a specialized secondary level education and for a source of additional income, 26 years ago she started a business in agriculture.  She has a cow, a horse, 20 sheep, a calf, and 3 mares, as well as 0.42 ha of land.  Today, her business brings in a good monthly income.

To develop her business further, Atipa applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy two cows.  She plans to invest the profits from this loan in continued business development and she plans to buy additional land for farming.

loans.use: to purchase two cows in order to invest in her business

loans.name: Zinat

texts.ru: Зинат, 38 лет, разведена, 3 детей. Около 10 лет назад начала заниматься торговлей игрушками для детей, продуктами питания и одеждой. У Зинат есть торговая точка на рынке, также открыт магазин на территории дома. На сегодняшний день Зинат смогла развить свою деятельность, у нее есть товар в обороте на сумму 15,000 сом (KGS). Ежемесячная прибыль составляет примерно 35,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса Зинат обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение товаров в обороте и расширение ассортимента. Доходы от кредита Зинат планирует направить на расширение своего магазина.
texts.en:
Zinat is 38 years old, divorced, and has three children.  About 10 years ago, she started a business in selling toys, groceries, and clothes.  Zinat has a stall at the market and she has opened a store at her home.  Zinat has been able to develop her business to the point where she has an inventory worth 15,000 som (KGS) and a monthly profit of about 35,000 som (KGS).  

With an aim to further developing her business, Zinat applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to increase her inventory and expand her assortment of goods.  Zinat plans to use the profits to expand her store.

loans.use: to buy products for sale in order to provide better variety for her customers

loans.name: Gulzat

texts.ru: Гулзат 27 лет, замужем, двое детей. У  Гулзат высшее образование. В поисках источника дохода для своей семьи 6 лет назад начала свой бизнес в торговле сувениров, подарков, бижутерии и прочего. Благодаря упорному труду Гулзат на сегодняшний день у нее есть товар в обороте на сумму 50,000 сом (KGS). Выручка от торговой деятельности составляет около 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гулзат обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку товаров для увеличения ассортимента, что позволит привлечь новых клиентов. Доходы от кредита Гулзат планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en:
Gulzat is 27 years old, married, and has two children.  She has a higher education.  Needing to find a source of income for her family, six years ago she started her own business selling souvenirs, gifts, fashion jewelry, etc.  As a result of her hard work, today Gulzat has an inventory worth 50,000 som (KGS).  Her income from the business comes to about 15,000 som (KGS).

With an aim to further developing her business, Gulzat applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy goods to expand her inventory, which will attract new customers.  Gulzat plans to invest the profits in continued business development.

loans.use: to increase her inventory of products, which will allow to invest in further growth of her business

loans.name: Aisalkyn

texts.ru: Айсалкын 43 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. У Айсалкын - средне-специальное образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она занимается торговлей продуктами питания и товарами широкого потребления, начав свой бизнес 10 лет назад. Благодаря упорному труду Айсалкын, у нее есть товар в обороте на 100,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение товара в обороте. Доходы от кредита Айсалкын планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение бизнеса.
texts.en:
Aisalkyn is 43 years old, married, and she and her husband have three children.  Aisalkyn has a specialized secondary level education.  Her family's main income is her business selling groceries and consumer goods.  She started her business 10 years ago and as a result of her hard work, today Aisalkyn has an inventory worth 100,000 som (KGS).  

With an aim to developing her business further, Aisalkyn applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 80,000 som (KGS) to increase her inventory. Aisalkyn plans to invest the profits from the loan in further expansion of her business.

loans.use: to increase the assortment in her shop and be more competitive

loans.name: Akbermet

texts.ru: Акбермет 24 года, не замужем, детей нет. У Акбермет - высшее образование, на протяжении 3 лет занимается торговлей трикотажных изделий. Благодаря упорному труду Акбермет, у нее имеется товар в обороте на сумму 100,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Акбермет обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку швейных изделий для увеличения товаров в обороте с последующей реализацией в собственном магазине по высокой цене. Доходы от кредита Акбермет планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en:
Akbermet is 24 years old.  She is not married and has no children.  She has a higher education and for the last three years, she has been in business selling knitted clothes.  Thanks to her hard work, today Akbermet has an inventory worth 100,000 som (KGS). 

With the goal of further expanding her business, Akbermet applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 40,000 som  (KGS) to buy apparel in order to increase her inventory, and resulting higher-priced retail sales.  Akbermet plans to invest the profits from the loan in further business development.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for resale in order to increase turnover in her inventory

loans.name: Egdi Argentina

texts.es:
En las afueras de Portoviejo, ciudad hermosa de verdes montañas y paisajes  encantadores, encontramos el lugar donde se reúnen cada quince días las socias del Grupo De Crédito San Judas Tadeo.
En este lugar vive la señora Egdi, tiene 52 años de edad, es madre soltera de una hija de 11  años de edad, la cual estudia en escuela. Lleva 12 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque gracias a los créditos empezó su negocio el cual le permite salir adelante.
Doña Egdi es una mujer que le gusta salir adelante sola con su hija, ella tiene una pequeña tienda de víveres en su casa, allí vende todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad  como granos, legumbres, plátano y ciertas bebidas, allí también vende productos de bazar, cosméticos, perfumes, helados entre otras cosas, a ella le gusta tener bien surtida su tienda para darles a sus clientes lo que ellos necesitan, lleva 12  años con su tienda, la cual surtió con el primer crédito que recibió del grupo.
Este crédito es para comprar víveres para surtir su tienda. Sus sueños son darle lo mejor  a su hija.
texts.en:
The women of the San Judas Tadeo group meet fortnightly in the outskirts of Portoviejo, which is a beautiful city with green mountains and stunning landscapes.

Egdi lives here, a 52-year-old single mother with an 11-year-old daughter who attends school. Egdi has been a member of the group for 12 years and she likes it because, thanks to the loans, she set up her business, which allows her to get on in life.

Egdi is a woman who like to succeed on her own with her daughter. She has a small grocery shop that she runs from her home. She sells all kinds of basic produce there such as grains, vegetables, bananas and some drinks. She also sells consumer products such as cosmetics, perfume and ice-cream. She likes to keep her shop well-stocked to provide the items her customers need. She has run the shop for 12 years, and stocked it with the first loan that she received through the group.

This loan is to buy provisions to stock her shop. Her dream is to provide her daughter with the best she can.

loans.use: to buy grocery supplies.

loans.name: Felicita Isabel

texts.es:
Felicita Isabel tiene 34 años de edad, es casada, tiene 2 hijos, vive con su familia en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

Felicita Isabel se dedica a la venta de abarrotes, como arroz, azúcar, leche, aceite, huevos, menestras, etc; con más de 5 años de experiencia en el negocio, el mismo que esta ubicado en su domicilio. Ella solicita préstamo para capital de trabajo, compra de mayor mercadería, pues desea aumentar y diversificar su stock de productos, dicha inversión le servirá para incrementar sus ventas, satisfaciendo todos los gustos y preferencias de su público consumidor, con gran influencia en el negocio; Felicita Isabel piensa tener mayor stock de productos para poder atender las diversas necesidades, requerimientos y gustos de los clientes de la zona.
texts.en:
Felicita Isabel is 34, married, and has two children. She lives with her family in a rural area in the Oyotún district, which is in the province of Chiclayo in the Lambayeque region, situated on the northern coast of Peru. The local community is engaged in agriculture, livestock production and commerce.

Felicita Isabel works selling grocery produce such as rice, sugar, milk, oil, eggs and pulses. She has been running her business, which she runs from her home, for over 5 years.

She is asking for a loan for working capital to buy wholesale produce as she wants to increase and diversify her range of goods. This inversion will help to increase her sales, satisfying the tastes and preferences of her customers, and will have a major influence on her business.

Felicita Isabel hopes to have a larger stock of products to be able to meet the various needs, requirements and tastes of the customers in her area.

loans.use: to use as working capital to buy wholesale goods so she can increase and diversify her range of products.

loans.name: Santa Gertrudis

texts.es:
En las afueras de Portoviejo, ciudad hermosa de verdes montañas y paisajes  encantadores, encontramos el lugar donde se reúnen cada quince días las socias del Grupo De Crédito San Judas Tadeo.
En este lugar vive la señora Santa, tiene 39 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos de 22, 16 y 14 años de edad, todos viven en su casa dos de ellos estudian en colegio. El marido es albañil.
Doña Santas con la finalidad de contar con sus propios ingresos y con estos ayudar con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de productos por catálogos de Avon, Belcorp (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas), trabaja todos los días más que todo en las horas de la mañana ya que a esas horas le resulta más fácil realizar sus recorridos, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta y por pedidos y cobra cada 8 días, lleva más de tres años con este negocio el cual le permite  salir adelante junto  a su querida familia.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar perfumes, bisutería, cosméticos y cremas. Lleva más de 3 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por el servicio de atención médica que brinda la institución. Sus sueños es darles lo mejor a  sus hijos.
texts.en:
The women of the San Judas Tadeo communal bank meet fortnightly in the outskirts of Portoviejo, a beautiful city with green mountains and stunning landscapes.

39-year-old Santa lives here with her common-law husband and their children aged 22, 16 and 14. They all live together in their house, and two of the children go to school. Her husband is a bricklayer.

Santas wants to earn her own income to help with the household costs, and so she sells Avon and Belcorp catalogue goods such as beauty products, cosmetics, perfume and ladies' accessories. She works every day, mostly in the mornings as this is when it's easier for her to do her rounds. Her means of selling is door-to-door and by taking orders. She collects her money weekly. She has been running this business for over three years, and it allows her to be successful alongside the family she loves.

She is going to use to loan to buy perfume, costume jewellery, cosmetics and creams. She has been a member of the communal bank for over three years. She likes it because of the healthcare the group provides. Her dream is to provide her children with the best she can.

loans.use: to buy perfume, costume jewellery, cosmetics and creams.

loans.name: Martha María

texts.es:
En las afueras de Portoviejo, ciudad hermosa de verdes montañas y paisajes  encantadores, encontramos el lugar donde se reúnen cada quince días las socias del Grupo De Crédito San Judas Tadeo.
En este lugar vive la señora Martha, tiene 35 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cuatro hijos de 19, 17, 9 años, y el último es un bebé de 7 meses, los mayores estudian en colegio y escuela. 
Doña Martha es una mujer que le gusta valerse por sí misma y ganar sus propios ingresos y con esto poder ayudar en los gastos que genera el hogar, ella se dedica  al comercio, vende  ropa de todo tipo, ella vende en su casa o puerta a puerta ya que  sale tres días por semana más que todo  las mañanas ya que a esa hora le es más fácil ir a visitar a sus clientes, deja a créditos y cobra cada ocho días lo cual le sirve para cobrar e ir vendiendo nuevamente. Tiene más de 3 años que se dedica a esta actividad la cual comenzó con uno de los créditos que recibió.
Este crédito lo va a ocupar en comprar ropa de todo tipo. Lleva tres años  en  el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos y le ayudan mucho. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
In the outskirts of Portoviejo, a beautiful city with green mountains and enchanting landscapes, we find the place where every five days the members of San Judas Tadeo Credit Group come together.
Here lives madam Martha. She is 35 years old and lives in a common law marriage of which she has four children of 19, 17 and 9 years old and the last one is a baby of 7 months. The older ones study in college and school.

Doña Martha is a woman that likes to fend for herself and have her own income and with this she can help with the household expenses. She makes a living with commerce, she sells clothing of all types. She sells from her house or goes door to door, she leaves the house three days a week, mainly in the mornings as at this time it is easier to visit her clients. She sells on credit and collects every eight days, which helps her to collect and sell again. For more than 3 years she has made a living with this activity which started with one of the loans she received.
This loan she will use to buy clothing of all types. She has three years at the Credit Group and she likes it because the loans are quick and help her a lot. Her dream is to give her children the very best.

loans.use: to buy clothing

loans.name: Nila De Los Dolores

texts.es:
En las afueras de Portoviejo, ciudad hermosa de verdes montañas y paisajes  encantadores, encontramos el lugar donde se reúnen cada quince días las socias del Grupo De Crédito San Judas Tadeo.
En este lugar vive la señora Nila, tiene 65 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cinco hijos mayores de edad, uno de ellos aun  vive en su casa junto a su familia ya que es casado. El marido es comerciante.
Doña Nila es una gran ama de casa que realiza el crédito para ayudarle a su esposo  el cual tiene un negocio de venta de frutas y legumbres, su esposo muy de madrugada se va al mercado de mayoristas  a abastecerse de todos los productos que el vende y luego en su carro ir a  vender por toda la ciudad,  el  también se dedica a la agricultura en la época invernal.  Realiza esto desde hace mas de 20 años y es así como el se gana el sustento diario de toda la familia.
Este crédito es para comprar frutas y legumbres para su negocio. Es socia fundadora del Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por los beneficios que brinda el Banco. Sus sueños son tener una tienda de víveres en su casa.
texts.en:
On the outskirts of Portoviejo, a beautiful city of green mountains and enchanting landscapes, is the place where the San Judas Tadeo communal bank is located.

This is where Nila lives, 65 years old and in a common-law marriage from which she has five adult children. One of them still lives in her house with her own family as she is married. Her husband is a small businessman.

Nila is a great housewife who is requesting a loan to help her husband who has a business selling fruit and vegetables. Her husband goes to the wholesale market very early in the morning to get supplies of all of the products he sells, and then goes in his truck selling them all over the city. He also works in agriculture during the winter season. He has done this work for more than 20 years and this is how he earns enough to feed his whole family every day.

This loan is to buy fruit and vegetables for his business. This founding member of the communal bank likes it because of the benefits that it offers. Her dreams are to have a grocery store in her home.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Bendición De Dios  (Portoviejo) Group

texts.es:
EL Grupo de Crédito Bendición De Dios se reúne cada quince días en Los Arenales de  la parroquia Crucita en Portoviejo, lugar conocido por sus hermosas playas que rodean el lugar el cual es muy visitado en toda época del año por los turistas nacionales o extranjeros, además por su variedad culinaria la cual es muy apreciada por los visitantes.
Este es un grupo formado por 10 mujeres y 2 hombres que decidieron unirse tiempo atrás y formar este Grupo que les ha servido de mucho ya que con los créditos, ellos han podido mejorar sus pequeños negocios. La mayoría de ellos se dedican a la pesca o actividades relacionadas con la misma.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la señora Viviana, tiene 28 años de edad, es madre soltera tiene una hija de 13 años la misma que estudian en colegio. 
Doña Viviana es una mujer que le gusta salir adelante con su hija, tiene una pequeña tienda de víveres en su casa, allí vende todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad  como granos, legumbres, pollo, carne, helados entre otras cosas, a ella le gusta tener bien surtida su tienda para darles a sus clientes lo que ellos necesitan, a pesar de que recién tiene un año con su negocio lo tiene bien surtido y son muchos los clientes que llegan ya que ella vende más barato que las otras tiendas razón por lo cual la prefieren.
Este crédito es para comprar víveres para surtir su tienda. Lleva 4 ciclos en el Grupo de Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos ella empezó  su negocio. Sus sueños son darle lo mejor  a su hija.
La foto pequeña de de dos socios que no pudieron estar presentes cuando se tomo la foto del grupo.
texts.en:
The Bendición De Dios Credit Group comes together every five days in Los Arenales at the Crucita parish in Portoviejo, a place known for its beautiful beaches that surround the place and is very well visited during the whole year by national tourists and foreigners, also for its culinary variety which is very appreciated by the visitors.
This group is formed by 10 women and 2 men that decided to unite some time ago and form this group that has helped them a lot, as with the loans they have been able to improve their small businesses. The majority of them makes a living with fishing or activities related to that. One of the members of this group is madam Viviana, she is 28 years old and is a single mother who has a 13 year old daughter that studies in school.

Doña Viviana is a woman that likes to get ahead with her daughter. She has a small grocery store in her house, there she sells all kinds of basic groceries like grains, vegetables, chicken, meat, ice cream, among others. She likes to have her shop well-stocked to give her clients what they need. In spite of only having her business for one year, she has it well-stocked and has a lot of clients that come to her as she sells her produce much cheaper than the other shops, which is the reason they prefer her shop.

This loan is to buy groceries to stock up her shop. She has been 4 cycles with the Credit Group and she likes it because with the loans she started her business. Her dream is to give the best to her daughter.

The small photo is of two members that could not be present when the photo of the group was taken.

loans.use: to buy groceries

loans.name: Ana Patricia

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Las Luminosas  se reúne cada quince días en el  en el sitio las Palmas del Cantón Montecristi, lugar conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. 
En este lugar vive la señora Ana, tiene 33 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de  14, 9  y 5 años de edad, estudian en colegio, escuela y el más pequeño esta en inicial. Su esposo es comerciante.
Doña Ana junto a su esposo se dedican a la preparación y venta de pan de almidón, tortillas de yuca y maíz acompañadas de jugos, café o sodas, trabajan todos los días desde muy temprano en la mañana y pasan todo el día en su negocio que es en las afueras de su casa, sus ventas son muy buenas ya que su negocio está en la vía Portoviejo, Manta y Jipijapa, son muchas personas que pasan  por estas vías por lo cual sus ventas son muy buenas y les da lo necesario para salir adelante, llevan más de 3 años en este negocio.
 Este crédito es para comprar víveres para preparar los alimentos. Es fundadora del Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan a ella y a sus compañeras. Sus sueños son que a sus hijos nunca les falte nada.
texts.en:
The Las Luminosas Credit Group meets every five days at Las Palmas del Cantón Montecristi, a place known for its rich pre-colonial culture and its handicrafts, which are nationally and internationally recognized.
In this place lives madam Ana. She is 33 years old, she is married and of this relationship she has three children of 14, 9 and 5 years old, who study in college, school and the youngest in primary school. Her husband is a merchant.

Doña Ana together with her husband makes a living preparing and selling starch bread, cassava and maize tortillas, acompanied with juices, coffee or sodas. They work every day from early in the morning and they spend the whole day in their business, which is just outside their house. Their sales are good as the business is at the road Portoviejo to Manta and Jipijapa. A lot of people pass by these roads which is why their sales are very good and it gives them what they need to get ahead. They have been in this business for more than three years.

This loan is to buy supplies to prepare the food. She is founder of the Credit Group and she likes it for the help that was given to her and her companions. Her dream is that her children will never lack anything.

loans.use: to buy supplies

loans.name: Fátima Livida

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Las Luminosas  se reúne cada quince días en el  en el sitio las Palmas del Cantón Montecristi, lugar conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. 
En este lugar vive la señora Fátima, tiene 31 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos de 12, 8 y 4 años de edad,  los dos mayores  estudian en escuela. El marido es chofer. 
Doña Fátima es una ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto  ayudarle a su esposo en los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de aretes de plata, bisutería y productos Yanbal (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, ella sale tres a cuatros días a la semana por su localidad ofreciendo sus productos los mismos que  deja a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. Tiene 8 años que se dedica a esta actividad por lo cual tiene mucha clientela, lo que más vende son los perfumes ya que son muy buenos.
Este crédito es para comprar perfumes, cremas, cosméticos y aretes. Lleva 4 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque así puede financiar su negocio. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The Las Luminosas communal bank group meets every two weeks in Las Palmas in Montecristi canton, a place known for its rich precolonial history and for its crafts which are known at national and international level.  

In this place lives Fátima, who is 31 years old, and in a common-law marriage, from which she has three children, ages 12, 8, and 4. The older ones are in school. Her husband is a driver.

Fátima is a housewife who, in order to get her own income and, in turn, her husband with the household expenses, works selling silver earrings, costume jewelry and Yanbal products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes, and women's accessories). Her method of sales is door-to-door. She goes out four days each week in her area, offering her products, which she leaves on credit, and comes to collect every week. She has been in this business for 8 years, so she has many customers. She sells the most of perfumes, since they are very good. 

This loan is to purchase perfumes, creams, cosmetics, and earrings. She has been in this group for 4 years and she likes it because with it she can finance her business. Her dream is to give the best to her children.

loans.use: to purchase perfumes, creams, cosmetics, and earrings.

loans.name: Mujeres Valientes Group

texts.es:
El grupo se llama “Mujeres Valientes” ya que ellas decidieron juntarse y formar este grupo, de una manera valiente y con muchas esperanzas, forman parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, donde están haciendo la encuesta de los 50 indicadores.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Filomena, quien en su  encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, lo que quiere decir que debe esforzarse un poco más, y seguir capacitándose. Ella  a través de su esfuerzo y por medio del humilde trabajo de remedios naturales, da a su familia lo que puede, pero se sigue esforzando.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar remedios en cantidad, y por medio de ellos poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
This group is called “Mujeres Valientes” since they decided to get together and form this group courageously and with much hope. They are part of the poverty elimination program, in which they complete the questionnaire about the 50 indicators. 

One of the members is Filomena, whose questionnaire showed a poverty level within level one, which is to say that she should work a bit harder and continue getting training.  Through her efforts and her humble work selling natural remedies, she gives her family what she can, but she continues working hard.

She asks for this loan to purchase remedies in bulk, and with them, she will be able to continue with her work as she has been doing.

loans.use: to purchase natural remedies to sell.

loans.name: Martha Cecilia

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Las Luminosas  se reúne cada quince días en el  en el sitio las Palmas del Cantón Montecristi, lugar conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. 
En este lugar vive la señorita Martha, tiene 40 años de edad, es soltera y  vive en casa de sus padres, los mismos que ya son mayores. 
Doña Martha es una mujer muy trabajadora que le gusta a base de esfuerzo salir adelante, tiene una tienda de víveres en su casa donde vende todo tipo de productos, como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, legumbres, verduras y frutas, además de dulces, miel de abeja y otros productos típicos de la provincia que aprovecha para vender estos productos a personas que pasan por esta localidad rumbo a otras ciudades, ya que su negocio está en plena vía principal lo cual le favorece y sus ventas siempre son buenas, trabaja con la ayuda de sus padres desde hace más de 20 años.
Este crédito es para surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, dulces y otros víveres que vende en su local. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda de los créditos. Sus metas son seguir aumentando su tienda.
texts.en:
The Las Luminosas communal bank group meets every two weeks in Las Palmas in Montecristi canton, a place known for its rich precolonial history and for its crafts, which are known on a national and international level.

In this place lives Martha, who is 40 years old, single, and lives in her parents' house, who are elderly.

Martha is a very hard-working woman who likes to, with her efforts, get ahead. She has a grocery store in her house and sells all sorts of products such as rice, sugar, oil, detergent, vegetables, legumes, and fruits, in addition to candies, honey and other typical products of the province.  She makes the most of selling these products to people who pass through this area on the way to other cities, since her business is right on the main route, which is a benefit for her and her sales are always good. She has worked with her parents' help for over 20 years.

This loan is to stock her store more. She will purchase rice, sugar, oil, sweets and other groceries that she sells in her store. She has been in this communal bank group from the beginning and she likes it because of the help of the loans. Her goal is to continue expanding her store.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, oil, sweets and other groceries.

loans.name: Divino

texts.en:
Divino is thankful for the financial assistance extended to him as he was able to buy spare parts and accessories and to maintain his jeepney unit. His earnings were a big help for the education of his children and in their personal, household and business expenditures.

He would like to apply for another 40,000 PHP loan to buy spare parts for the maintenance of his jeepney. His profits from his business will definitely help him to sustain his family's daily needs and educational expenses of his children. He looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in his heart. 

Divino wants to buy another jeepney and he hopes that all his children will finish their schooling. Every week, he meets up with his co-fellowship* members to share stories of his life and business and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God he studies. 

* All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for spare parts and maintenance of his jeepney unit.

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie is 54 years old and married with three children.

She earns a living by raising chickens in the Philippines. Rosemarie is borrowing 25000 PHP through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her chickens.

Rosemarie has been raising chickens for 14 years and also earns additional income from general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her chickens.

loans.name: Nasiba

texts.ru: Насиба, 44 года, замужем, есть 3 детей, вся семья с радостью помогает по хозяйству. У Насибы среднее образование и большой трудовой стаж. Около 12 лет назад Насиба стала заниматься животноводством и полеводством, накопив на старт сумму в 20,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Насибы на сегодняшний день у нее есть 2 дойные коровы и 1 бычок. Также на арендованной земельной доле мерою 4,00 ГА она выращивает клевер и ячмень для внутрихозяйственного потребления. Ежемесячная прибыль от продажи скота и молока составляет всего около 18,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Насиба обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сом (KGS) на покупку породистых дойных коров для увеличения объемов продажи экологически чистого, вкусного домашнего молока. Насиба планирует расширить ее бизнес и накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en:
Nasiba is 44 years old, married, and has three children. Her entire family gladly helps her with her business.  Nasiba has a secondary-level education and a long work history.   About 12 years ago, she started a business in farming and animal husbandry with an initial capital of 20,000 som (KGS).  As a result of her hard work, today Nasiba has two milking cows and a bull-calf.  She also rents 4.0 ha of land where she grows sainfoin and barley for cattle fodder.  Her monthly income from selling cattle and milk comes to about 18,000 som (KGS).

With an aim to developing her business further, Nasiba applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 120,000 som (KGS) to buy pure bred milking cows to increase the volume of ecologically friendly, good tasting and farm-fresh milk that she sells.  Nasiba has plans to expand her business and to save up money to repair her home.

loans.use: to purchase dairy cows in order to increase the volume of eco-friendly milk selling

loans.name: Sultonboy

texts.ru: Султонбой  мужчина 60 лет, женат, отец пятерых детей. Родился и вырос в сельской местности и с раннего возраста работал на поле ,помогал родителям смотреть за скотом и выращивать овощи и фрукты. Султонбой на протяжение пяти лет занимается животноводством.На своём участке земли он имеет 10 голов  крупного рогатого скота. Он покупает коров и после их откорма продаёт за более высокую цену. Молоко ,полученное от дойки коров,жена Султонбоя продаёт на рынке. Молоко хорошо скупается. На данный момент Султонбой хочет запастись  кормом для скота,но не имеет нужной суммы. Поэтому он обратился в МДО Арванд за финансовой поддержкой. Султонбой заранее благодарит МДО Арванд за поддержку и доверие.
texts.en:
Sultonboi is 60 years old, married, and the father of five children.  He was born and raised in a rural area and he has worked in the fields from an early age, when he helped his parents look after their cattle and raise fruits and vegetables.  Sultonboi has had a cattle business for five years.  He keeps ten head of cattle on his own land.  He buys cows and, after fattening them up, resells them for a higher price.  Sultonboi's wife sells milk from their cows at the local market.  They always sell out all their milk.

Presently Sultonboi wants to put away feed for the cattle, but he doesn't have enough money.  For this reason, he turned  to MDO Arvand, LLC for financial support.  Sultonboi wants to thank MDO Arvand, LLC in advance for its support and trust.

loans.use: to buy livestock feed

loans.name: Mahfirat

texts.ru: Махфират –женщина  40 лет,замужем,имеет четверых детей.Родилась и выросла в сельской местности.Она помогала родителям в выращивании овощей и фруктов,ухаживала за скотом. Махфират не получила высшего образования,потому что её родители не имели возможности в то время обучить своих детей.Сейчас Махфират занимается купле-продажей женских тканей на рынке.Торговля идёт хорошо.Ей сын в этом году закончил школу и поступил в университет.Но  Махфират на данный момент не имеет нужной суммы для оплаты образования.Она хочет,чтобы её дети выучились и могли найти себе достойную высокооплачиваемую  работу.Поэтому она обратилась в МДО Арванд за финансовой поддержкой.Махфират заранее благодарит МДО Арванд за поддержку и доверие.
texts.en:
Mahfirat is 40 years old, married, and has four children.  She was born and raised in a rural area and she helped her parents grow fruits and vegetables, and to look after cattle.  Mahfirat never got a higher education because at that time her parents didn't have the ability to give their children educations.  Mahfirat is now in business selling fabric for women's clothes at the market.  Business is going well.

Mahfirat very much wants her children to get good educations and to find dignified, high-paying jobs.  This year, her son finished school and was accepted to the university.  Presently, Mahfirat doesn't have the necessary funds to pay her son's tuition so she turned to MDO Arvand, LLC for financial support.  Mahfirat thanks MDO Arvand, LLC in advance for its trust and support.

loans.use: to pay her son's university tuition

loans.name: Nguyệt

texts.en:
Mrs. Nguyệt has a retail business selling dry food. Nguyệt is 33 years old and she is married with three children. Nguyệt lives with three dependents in Hau Loc district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Nguyệt's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Nguyệt has been involved in her business for more than 10 years. One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a water tank and a water filter. She is requesting a loan to buy a water tank and a clean water filter.

In the future, Nguyệt hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to buy a water tank and a clean water filter

loans.name: Umarkul

texts.ru: Умаркул  мужчина 55 лет , женат,отец пятерых детей. Умаркул родился и вырос в сельской местности и с детства работает на поле, выращивает урожай , ухаживает за скотом.  В настоящее время на своём участке земли имеет 7 голов коров, одну лошадь и одного козла. Так как Умаркулу уже достаточно лет ,ему сложно  справляться одному . Поэтому ему помогают его жена и дети .Каждое утро жена  Умаркула доет коров и продаёт молоко на рынке.Сейчас Умаркул хочет приобрести пару голов рогатого скота и закупить корм для скота. Но в данный момент не имеет нужной суммы. Поэтому он обратился в МДО Арванд за финансовой поддержкой. Он надеется,что МДО Арванд откликнется на его просьбу и заранее благодарит за поддержку и доверие.
texts.en:
Umarkul is 55 years old, married, and the father of five children.  He was born and raised in a rural area and since his childhood, has worked in the fields raising crops and rearing cattle.  He currently owns a piece of land where he has 7 cows, a horse, and a goat.  Since he's already getting on in years, it's hard for Umarkul to do everything himself and so his wife and children help him.  Umarkul's wife milks the cows every morning and sells the milk at the market.

Presently, Umarkul would like to buy a couple head of cattle and feed, but he doesn't have the necessary amount of money.  For this reason, he turned to MDO Arvand, LLC for financial support.  He is hoping that MDO Arvand, LLC will answer his request and wants to thank it in advance for its trust and support.

loans.use: to buy livestock and feed

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 45 años de edad, vive sola en su casa, no tiene hijos bajo su responsabilidad, dedicada a la venta de frutas hacia la selva, la casa del cliente se encuentra ubicada en el distrito de Pucará, provincia de Jaén, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

Rosa se dedica a la Venta de fruta, desde hace 10 años. En el pasaje de Santa Rosa. Ella necesita del crédito para realizar la inversión en el negocio de frutas, pues desea comprar frutas de temporada al por mayor y venderlas al por menor para así tener una ganancia aceptable. Invirtiendo en frutas lograra mayores ingresos, y con ello sus ganacias seran mayores, lo que le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosa is 45, lives by herself in her house and doesn't have children that she is responsible for. She sells tropical fruits. Her house is located in the district of Pucara, province of Jaen, in the region of Cajamarca, in the rural north of Peru.

Her community works in agriculture, livestock farming and commerce.

Rosa has been selling fruit for 10 years at the Santa Rosa passage. She needs the loan to make an investment in the fruit selling business, she needs to buy seasonal fruits at wholesale prices to then resell them at retail prices and this way have a reasonable profit. By investing in fruits she will have more income and her profits will be larger. This will allow her to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to make an investment in buying fruit for sale

loans.name: Victor Alfredo

texts.es: Victor de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus tres hijos, el se dedica al cultivo de maíz y maicillo desde hace 20 años, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y asi tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Victor is 45 years old, lives in his own home with his wife and three children. He has worked growing corn and sorghum for 20 years. He sells his produce in the different markets which are located near his house. 

He is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, manure, pest killers, herbicides, etc. to improve the land which is shown in the photograph as this is his only source of work and thus have better income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, manure, pest killers, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Inojat

texts.ru: Иноят – женщина  45 лет , замужем ,мать троих детей. Родилась и выросла в сельской местности и с детства работает на поле. Она получила педагогическое образование и в настоящее время работает учителем начальных классов. Но учительской зарплаты не хватает даже на необходимые нужды семьи.Поэтому Иноят ещё подрабатывает портнихой, она шьёт женские платья. К тому же ,на своём участке земли Иноят ухаживает за крупным рогатым скотом . Молоко ,полученное от дойки коров, Иноят  продаёт на рынке.   Она трудится в поте лица, чтобы обеспечить своих детей и дать им хорошее образование.В этом году дочь Иноят поступила в высшее учебное заведение.Но у Иноят нет полной суммы для оплаты обучения. Поэтому она обратилась в МДО Арванд. Иноят заранее благодарит МДО Арванд за поддержку и доверие.
texts.en: Inojat is a 45 year old woman who is married and is the mother of three children. She was born and raised in a rural area and has worked in the fields since childhood. She has a pedagogical education and is currently a primary school teacher. Her teacher’s salary is not enough to meet the needs of her family, so Inojat also works as a seamstress, sewing dresses for women. In addition, she takes care of cattle on her own plot of land. She sells cow’s milk at the market. She works hard to provide for her children and to give them a good education. This year her daughter is going to university, but Inojat does not have the full amount to pay the tuition. This is why she went to MDO Arvand. Inojat thanks MDO Arvand in advance for their support and trust.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's college tuition

loans.name: Ester

texts.es:
Ester de 36 años de edad, no estudio por la pobreza que su familia vivía y por las dificultades del conflicto armado que vivía El salvador en esa época.  Su compañero de vida trabaja como albañil, son padres de 2 hijos; una niña de 15 años que estudia octavo grado y el niño de 12 años que estudia cuarto grado de educación básica.

Ester siempre a trabajado en los oficios domésticos de la familia, también ha trabajado en la venta de verduras y frutas en la comunidad, tiene aproximadamente 2 años de realizar esta labor que le ha permitido ayudar a su esposo con los ingresos para la familia, las ventas las realiza en la misma colonia donde reside las verduras las compra en el mercado de la ciudad; ya que  le permite obtener a buen precio y obtener mejores ganancias.

      
El préstamo que está solicitando, es para comprar verduras como tomates, chiles, pipián y zanahorias, para diversificar su oferta para los clientes. 

Sus planes a futuro son mejorar sus ventas y obtener más clientes para que cada día ir aumentando las ventas que le permitan cancelar los compromisos adquiridos y  brindarles una mejor educación a sus hijos y que puedan ser personas de bien para la sociedad.
texts.en:
Ester is 36 years old. She disn't go to school due to the poverty her family lived in and due to the armed conflict El Salvador was going through at that time. Her life's companion works as a bricklayer. they are parents to two children, a 15 year old girl in eighth grade and a 12 year old boy in fourth grade of basic education

Ester has always done the housework in her family. She has also worked selling fruits and vegetables in the community. She has been doing this work for approximately 2 years. It has allowed her to help her husband with the family income. She makes her sales in the same neighborhood where she lives. She buys the vegetables in the city market because she can get them at a good price and make better profits

The loan she is asking for is to buy vegetables such as tomatoes, chiles, pipian squash and carrots to diversify the products she offers to her customers. 

Her plans for the future are to improver her sales and obtain more customers so that her sales will increase each day. This will allow her to pay off some debts she has acquired and offer her children a better education so they can become upstanding people who are good for society.

loans.use: to buy vegetables such as tomatoes, chiles, pipián squash and carrots to diversify her products for her customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for some tests and buy some medication.

loans.name: Saboat

texts.ru: Сабоат  женщина 55 лет,замужем,мать четырёх детей. На протяжение 10 лет она занимается купле-продажей мужской одежды.Сабоат арендует помещение на базаре , где ведёт свой бизнес. Одежду она приобретает в Китае ,покупает всё оптом , после чего продаёт свой товар. Клиентов у Сабоат много , торговля идёт хорошо. В настоящее время Сабоат хочет поехать за новой партией товара ,но не имеет достаточной суммы . Чтобы торговля не останавливалась,она обратилась в МДО Арванд за финансовой поддержкой. Сабоат надеется,что МДО Арванд откликнется на её просьбу о помощи . Заранее благодарит за поддержку и доверие.
texts.en: Saboat is a 55 year old woman who is married and mother to four children. She has been buying and selling men’s clothing for ten years. She rents a space at the market where she runs her business. She purchases the clothing in China, buying everything in bulk and then selling it. She has many customers and business is good. She currently wants to go to China for a new batch of clothing, but does not have enough money. In order to keep her business running, she turned to MDO Arvand for financial support. Saboat hopes that MDO Arvand will respond to her request for assistance. She thanks them in advance for their support and trust.

loans.use: to buy a new shipment of men's clothing

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sand, cement and to pay for labor costs.

loans.name: Mauricio Jesús

texts.es:
El Señor Mauricio Jesús, casado  padre de dos hijos uno de ello esta en edad escolar, trabaja en una empresa privada de la ciudad de León en atención al cliente se dedica a esta labor  desde hace once años, inicia su jornada laborar de siete de la mañana a cinco de la tarde de lunes a sábado. 

Mauricio  se acercó a Ceprodel a solicitar un crédito el que utilizara  para gastos de cirugía y compra de medicamento de su Mamá,  y así  le  permitirá recuperar la salud lo más pronto posible.
texts.en:
Mauricio Jesús is married and is the father of two children. One of them is school aged. He works in a private business in the city of León in customer service. He has been doing this work for two years. He starts his work day at seven in the morning until five in the afternoon Monday through Saturday.    

Mauricio approached Ceprodel to ask for a loan that he will use to pay for surgery and to buy medication for his mother. This will allow him to restore her health as soon as possible.

loans.use: to pay for surgery and buy medication for his mother.

loans.name: Abduhalil

texts.ru: Абдухалил  мужчина 28 лет,женат ,отец двоих детей. Родился в сельской местности и с детства работал на поле . Со временем переехал в город и сейчас занимается торговлей арбуза и дыни .Абдухалил имеет свою точку на рынке и  на протяжение шести лет ведёт торговлю. Так как это сезонная работа и торговля происходит только летом и в начале сентября,Абдухалил также работает помощником на заводе по производству муки . В настоящее время Абдухалил хочет купить новую партию товара ,но не имеет нужной суммы. Поэтому он обратился в МДО Арванд за финансовой поддержкой.Абдухалил заранее благодарит за доверие.
texts.en: Abduhalil is a 28 year old man who is married and the father to two children. He was born in a rural area and worked in the fields since childhood. He eventually moved to the city, where he currently sells watermelon and cantaloupe. Abduhalil has a place at the market and has been selling goods there for six years. Because it is seasonal work and he can only sell goods in the summer and the beginning of September, Abduhalil also works as an assistant at a flour mill. He currently wants to buy a new batch of goods but does not have the money. This is why he turned to MDO Arvand for financial support. He thanks them in advance for their trust.

loans.use: to buy a new shipment of melons

loans.name: Mukadas

texts.ru: Мукадас - женщина 40 лет , замужем , мать троих детей. Мукадас на протяжение 10 лет занимается бизнесом - купле - продажей  детской одежды .Она берёт в аренду магазин ,где ведёт свою торговлю. Товар она приобретает в Китае или в Бишкеке, два или три раза в год она ездит за новой партией товара . Торговля идёт хорошо , товар весь скупается . У Мукадас есть много постоянных клиентов. Она хочет быть финансово независимой ,не хочет брать деньги у мужа. Мукадас любит свою работу и делает всё,чтобы её дети жили не зная нужд . Она хочет приобрести новую партию товара и расширить свой товарооборот , но у неё нет полной суммы для этого.Поэтому она обратилась в МДО Арванд за финансовой поддержкой.Мукаддас заранее благодарит за поддержку и доверие.
texts.en: Mukadas is a 40 year old woman who is married and the mother of three children. She has been running a business buying and selling children’s clothing for ten years. She rents the space for a shop where she runs her business. She purchases clothing in China or in Bishkek two to three times per year. Business is good and all her goods have been sold. Mukadas has many steady customers. She wants to be financially independent and does not want to take money from her husband. Mukadas loves her work and does everything she can so that her children will not be deprived of anything. She wants to purchase a new batch of clothing and expand her business, but she does not have enough money to do so. This is why she turned to MDO Arvand for financial support. Mukadas thanks them in advance for their support and trust.

loans.use: to buy a new shipment of clothing

loans.name: Clemente

texts.es:
El Sr. Clemente , es dueño de un taller en donde se reparan frenos y embragues de vehiculos en general. Tiene antigüedad de mas de 17 años, y por sobre todo mucha experiencia, ya que sabe lo que hace.
Fue adquiriendo experiencia  como empleado y  luego pudo trabajar por cuenta propia, y ya se hizo de muchos clientes. Es casado, y comenta que junto con su esposa estan saliendo adelante.
Pide este prestamo para la compra de repuestos y accesorios para usarlos en su taller, ya que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Clemente has a shop where he repairs brakes and clutches on automobiles.  He has been doing this for over 17 years.  He has a lot of experience, and he knows what he is doing.  He gained experience as an employee, and he was later able to work on his own.  He has a lot of customers.  He is married, and he says that he and his wife are getting ahead together.

He is requesting this loan to buy replacement parts and accessories to use in his shop.  This will be a big help to him.

loans.use: to buy replacement parts and accessories.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es: Maribel de 42 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo. Ella posee un taller de costura en el lugar de su residencia donde confecciona diferentes tipos de prendas, últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela porque el trabajo que el realiza es excelente y lo vende a precios realmente accesibles; ella es una mujer muy dedicada a su trabajo responsable y honesta, Maribel esta solicitando un crédito que le permita comprar: telas, hilos, agujas, y todo lo relacionado con la costura para seguir satisfaciendo la necesidad de los clientes y asi ella  podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su familia.
texts.en: Maribel is 42 years old and lives in a house that she owns with her husband and son. Maribel has a dressmaking shop where she makes all different types of clothing. Recently she has gained many customers because she does excellent work and sells it at affordable prices. Maribel is very dedicated to her work; she is responsible and honest. Maribel is applying for a loan in order to buy threads, material, needles and other items for dressmaking in order to continue keeping her customers happy and to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy threads, material, needles and other items for dressmaking.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es: Roberto de 59 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus cuatro hijos, el se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol desde hace 35 años, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, adicional a eso también trabaja como jornal en una finca cerca de su casa, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Roberto is 59 years old and lives in a house that he owns with his wife and four children. For 35 years Roberto has been making a living growing corn and beans. He sells his various products at the markets near his house. Robert also works as a labourer at a farm near his home. Roberto is applying for a loan in order to buy seeds, fertilisers, manure, anti-disease treatments, weed-killers and more, and to improve his land (shown in the photograph) and earn a higher income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilisers, manure, anti-disease treatments, weed-killers and more, and to improve his land.

loans.name: San Francisco Group

texts.es:
Veronica es una mujer de 39 años de edad, casada, tiene tres hijos de 1, 12, 14 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de cosméticos por catálogo.
Ella es emprendedora, buena madre, resistente, comunicativa, sociable, responsable y trabajadora. Su labor la realiza en la zona de ‘la mutualista’ un lugar céntrico caracterizado por el cambódromo; que es dónde se realiza el corso de carnavales, una de las fiestas más importantes del lugar.
Verónica es de tez morena, estatura mediana, cabello negro largo, su lengua materna es el español y conoce el guaraní por herencia familiar (de cuclillas a la izquierda, usa; pantalón Marrón y polera gris obscuro). Debido a su necesidad de mejorar sus ingresos económicos, formó una banca de personas con negocios diferentes para solicitar un préstamo y ampliar sus negocios. Su negocio es la venta de cosméticos por catálogo de forma ambulante. Cada día ella tiene una rutina de visitas en diferentes; mercados, tiendas comerciales, oficinas, etc. Llevando un bolsón lleno de productos y unas revistas también, para llegar a sus destinos debe caminar y viajar largas distancias en busca de clientes nuevos, bajo los fuertes rayos del sol y los cambios climáticos. Este es el segundo préstamo que solicita a la institución, el anterior préstamo fue para iniciar su negocio y los pagos de sus cuotas fueron a tiempo, ella lleva tres años de experiencia en el rubro y su manera de vender y conseguir clientes la hacen una emprendedora exitosa.
Su vida la comparte con su esposo que se dedica al transporte libre y sus tres hijos; dos de los cuales asisten a la escuela y el tercero todavía es un bebé. Ella sueña tener un negocio familiar de venta de cosméticos y desea realizar la compra de mercadería por mayor; para aumentar su capital de trabajo y generar mayores ingresos para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
Es por esos motivos que Veronica solicita un préstamo para la compra de cosméticos por mayor y así contar con mayor oferta.
texts.en:
Veronica is 39 years old, married and has three children, ages fourteen, twelve and one. She has a business selling cosmetics from catalogues. 

Veronica is enterprising and a good mother. She is strong, a good communicator, sociable, responsible and hard-working.  Veronica sells her products at the "La Mutualista" area in the city centre by an large event venue. Carnival takes place here, one of the most important events in the place.

Veronica has dark skin, is of medium height and has Spanish as her native language. She also learned Guarani from family members. In the photo, Veronica is crouching on the left, wearing brown trousers. 

As she needed to earn a higher income, Veronica started a loan group with people who have different businesses. This group is applying for a loan and the members want to expand their businesses. 

Veronica has a business selling catalogue goods as a street vendor. Every day she does different visits to different people, markets, shops, offices and other places. Carrying a bag filled with goods and magazines, Veronica must walk under the beating sun and variable weather conditions to her various destinations and travel long distances to find new customers. This is Veronica's second loan from the organisation. She used her previous loan to start her business and made her repayments on time. Veronica has three years' experience with this business and her sales style and techniques for finding new customers make her a successful entrepreneur.

Veronica shares her life with her husband - who works in transport - and her three children, two of whom are in school and the youngest of whom is still a baby.  Veronica dreams of having a family business selling cosmetics. She wants to buy merchandise in bulk in order to increase her assets, generate a higher income and improve her family's quality of life. 

For these reasons, Veronica is applying for a loan in order to buy make up in bulk and to have more stock to sell.

loans.use: to buy make-up in bulk and to have more stock to sell.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
El comité se llama Mujeres Unidas, integrado por 17 mujeres, este es un grupo antiguo y fortalecido, se encuentran en el sexto ciclo, y están muy confiadas en el programa de comité de mujeres porque con el apoyo de sus compañeras y el asesoramiento de la fundación paraguaya.
La Sra. Emilia, miembro de este comité es distinguida por su labor, hoy día trabaja en su propio negocio, es dueña de una pequeña librería al lado mismo de una escuela, donde ofrece útiles escolares y servicio de fotocopiadora los alumnos de esa escuela, gracias a su labor ella tiene muchos clientes, y con ello ayuda a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de insumos para su librería, como cuadernos, libros, papeles, lápices, pinceles y demás, a la vez agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe de seguir con su emprendimiento.
texts.en:
The communal bank called "Mujeres Unidas" is made up of 17 women. This is an long standing, strong group who are in their 6th loan cycle. They are very confident in the Woman's Committee Program because of the support of their members and the advice from Fundación Paraguaya.

Emilia, a member of this group is known for her labor and today she works in her own business. She is the owner of a small bookstore beside a school where she sells school supplies and provides photocopy services to the students at the school. Thanks to her work she has lots of clients and she can help her family.

She is requesting this loan to buy supplies for her bookstore like notebooks, books, paper, pencils, brushes, etc. She is grateful for this opportunity that she is receiving to continue with her undertaking.

loans.use: notebooks, books, paper, pencils, brushes, etc.

loans.name: Renacer Group

texts.es:
El grupo Renacer está en su ciclo número 19 del programa de comité de mujeres, son de la Ciudad de Itá, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, y comentan que ya llevan un tiempo trabajando juntas, que se ayudan mutuamente y siempre están dispuestas a mejorar.
Liliana es una de las integrantes, ella se dedica a la venta de helados, ella es una señora muy buena, y que quiere poder ir mejorando su vida a través del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, que le ayuda a conocer sus puntos débiles y conforme a ello poder esforzarse más. Pide este préstamo para poder comprar helados variados, ya que en el país hace mucho calor y tiene mucha venta, por lo que quiere surtirse.
Agradecen todas las integrantes de este grupo por la oportunidad que están recibiendo.
texts.en:
The "Renacer" communal bank is in their 19th loan cycle with the Woman's Committee Program. They are from the city of Itá and they all work together and help each other to get ahead. They are participating in the Poverty Stoplight survey and comment that they have been working together for some time and they help each other and are always ready to improve.

Liliana is one of the members. She works selling ice-cream. She is a very good woman and she wants to be able to continue improving her life through the Poverty Stoplight Program. It helps her to understand her weak points and knowing this she can make a greater effort. She is requesting this loan to be able to buy a variety of ice-cream as in her country it is very hot and she sells a lot. So she wants to stock up.

All the members of the group are grateful for the opportunity that they are receiving.

loans.use: to buy a variety of ice-cream to sell.

loans.name: Kuña Mbarete Group

texts.es:
El grupo “Kuña Mbarete” está en su Sexto ciclo  del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas se comprometieron a trabajar y a ayudarse entre todas para salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde 3  de las 20 señoras se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, lo que quiere decir que están esforzándose un poco mas para poder ir mejorando cada día.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Maria, quien en su  encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, ella a través del esfuerzo y por medio de la venta de cosméticos que hace, esta saliendo adelante y ayudando a su familia. Es una persona que se sacrifica para poder ayudar a su familia, ya que quiere darles todo lo que ella no pudo tener y que no tengan que pasar por necesidades.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de cosméticos variados, ya que así podrá ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientas y cumplir con ellas.
texts.en:
The Kuña Mbarete group is in its sixth cycle with the women’s committee program.  They have all committed to working and helping each other to get ahead.  They are taking the elimination of poverty survey, and 3 of the 20 women are below the poverty line.  This means that they are putting forth a little more effort in order to be able to improve every day.

Maria is one of the members.  On the survey she came out a level one level of poverty.  Through her effort and her cosmetic sales, she is getting ahead and helping her family.  She is a person who makes sacrifices in order to be able to help her family.  She wants to give them everything that she was not able to have, and she does not want them to be in need.

She is requesting this loan in order to be able to buy varied cosmetics.  This way she will be able to offer a greater variety of products and satisfy her customers.

loans.use: to buy varied cosmetics.

loans.name: Mujeres En Progreso Group

texts.es:
Mujeres en Progreso se lama este grupo, se unió con vecinas y amigas de Ciudad del Este, ellas están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, que les da a conocer la situación de cada una, para que con ello puedan ir capacitándose en los que les hace falta.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Graciela quien es peluquera, tiene un salón, que con mucho sacrificio pudo montar, y que con ello mantiene a su familia, es una mujer muy buena, y en su trabajo es aun mejor, es por eso que tiene muchos clientes, comenta que su sueño es poder dar trabajo a otras personas que al igual que ella quieren trabajar.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de cremas, shampoo, enjuagues, tintes, y otros productos de uso en peluquería, para que pueda seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo y cumplir con sus clientes.
texts.en:
This group is called "Mujeres en Progreso". The members are neighbours and friends from the Ciudad del Este. They are part of the poverty elimination programme, which allows them to understand their situation so that they may do training in areas where they need it.

One member of this group is Graciela, a hairdresser. She has a salon that she was able to start with a lot of sacrifice. With the salon, she is able to support her family. Graciela is a good person and is good at her job. As a result she has many customers. Graciela says that her dream is to be able to give jobs to other people.

Graciela is applying for a loan to invest in lotions, shampoos, conditioner, hair dyes and other products that she will use in her hairdressing salon. These items will allow Graciela to continue with her work and to look after her customers' needs.

loans.use: to buy lotions, shampoos, conditioner, hair dyes and other products.

loans.name: Kuña Pyapy Mbarete Group

texts.es:
Kuña Pyapy Mbarete significa mujeres de brazo fuerte, ya que las integrantes de este grupo luchan por sus familias, para poder darles un mejor estilo de vida, y mejorar sus ingresos, todo esto a través del programa de eliminación de la pobreza.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Herminia, de profesión costurera, es una mujer muy trabajadora, todos los días empieza sus labores desde muy tempranas horas, gracias a que siempre hace muy buen trabajo, tiene ya una buena clientela formada. Es una señora muy entusiasta y con ánimos de salir adelante.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de telas, hilos, y otros, ya que de esa manera podrá seguir con su trabajo, luchando por mejorar su vida y la de su familia. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe de aprender a manejar sus ingresos a través de las capacitaciones.
texts.en:
Kuña Pyapy Mbarete means women with strong arms. The members of this group all struggle for their families to give them a better living standard and to improve their income. They do this through the Poverty Stoplight Program.

One of the members is Herminia who is a seamstress by trade. She is a hard-working woman who starts her labors very early every day. Thanks to the fact that she always does good work she has a good clientele established. She is a woman with enthusiasm and the desire to get ahead.

She is requesting this loan to buy fabric, thread and others as in this way she can continue with her work, striving to improve her life and that of her family. She is grateful for this opportunity that she is receiving to learn to manage her revenues through their training.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, etc.

loans.name: Tươi

texts.en:
Mrs. Tươi has a manufacturing business making mesh nets. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

Tươi is 42 years old and she is married with six children. Tươi lives with four dependents in Hau Loc district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2010, Tươi joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Tươi has successfully repaid five loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

Tươi has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Tươi hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet

loans.name: Rizalyn

texts.en:
Rizalyn is 28 years old and married. She was blessed with two children. To generate income, she operates their motorcycle transport within the local community. She wants to continuously operate her motorcycle to earn a higher income and help her husband in sustaining the necessities of her family. 

Due to insufficient capital, she would like to avail herself of a loan of 6,000 PHP to buy gasoline, spare parts and accessories needed for her motorcycle. She believes that this financial assistance will enable her to improve the business.

loans.use: to buy gasoline, spare parts and accessories needed for her motorcycle

location.town: Brgy. San Juan, Solano, Nueva Vizcay

loans.name: Jelfa

texts.en:
Jelfa is a  26-year-old married woman and a mother of two children from Ormoc City, Philippines. 

Jelfa earns a living through her small retail business. She sells goods such as rice, canned goods, noodles, soap and condiments. This is the source of her income. Jelfa has been in the business for more than two years now.

Jelfa is asking for a loan to buy more stock to sell such as canned goods, biscuits and snack foods, rice, soap and condiments. Through this, she will be able to augment her stock, thus allowing her to sell more to her customers. In the future, Jelfa hopes to make her business more sustainable and productive.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell such as canned goods, biscuits and snack foods, rice, soap and condiments

loans.name: Ma. Concepcion

texts.en:
