Ma. Concepcion is widowed. According to her, her husband left her with a lot of financial burden. She now solely takes care of her children. They have six children, however two are already married, two have their own job, and the other two are still attending school. 

Ma. Concepcion gets her income through her sari-sari store with a small bakery and through a computer shop. She usually earns Php 15,000 a month in these businesses. Though her eldest children do have their own family, she still helps them financially, especially one of her grandchildren. 

Ma. Concepcion opted to seek a  loan from KIVA lenders amounting to Php 15,000 to improve her business and to purchase more products such as condiments, canned goods, detergent soaps, biscuits and bread for her small bakery. She also plans to buy supplies for her computer shop like inks and bond papers.

loans.use: to purchase more products and buy supplies for her computer shop

loans.name: Oyniso

texts.ru: Ойнисо 55 лет. Она верная жена, заботливая мать и бабушка. Ойнисо живет на северном районе Спитамен. Ее муж мастер-строитель. У них трое взрослых детей. Сама Ойнисо животновод. Она занимается разведением мелкорогатых скотин на протяжении 8 лет. Ей помогает в этом бизнесе семья. Ойнисо в данный момент хочет увеличить поголовье баранов в своем скотном дворе для того чтобы получить больше дохода и расширить бизнес. Однако для реализации этой цели Ойнисо нуждается в кредите. Она просит вас помочь ей так как собственных средств не хватает.
texts.en:
Oyniso is 55. She is a faithful wife and caring mother and grandmother who lives in the northern region of Spitamen. Her husband is a builder and they have three adult children. Oyniso works in animal husbandry and has been raising small livestock for eight years. Her family helps her with this business. 

Oyniso wants to increase her head count of rams in order to receive greater revenue and expand her business. However, she needs a loan for this purchase. She is requesting your help since her own means aren't enough.

loans.use: to purchase some rams

loans.name: Katlyn

texts.en:
Katlyn is thankful for the financial assistance that was previously granted to her because she was able to purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help in her family's personal, household and business expenditures.

Katlyn would like to apply for another 18,000 PHP loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her current inventory. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result in better profit. Her profits from business will definitely help her to sustain their daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Katlyn desires to manage a bigger grocery store, and she wants to improve their ways of living. She meets with her co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God, which she studies.

All CCT (Center for Community Transformation Credit Cooperative) community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries, and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Junieta

texts.en:
Junieta is a merchant from Leyte, Philippines. She is 36 years old, married and has four children. Junieta has been in her business for more than five years now. Junieta sells various goods and items to the people in her place. This is her source of income. Junieta works hard in order to help her husband meet the needs of the family, especially the schooling of the children.

Junieta is asking for a loan to buy more stock to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, and rice. A loan could help Junieta to improve her store thus allowing her to sell more to her customers. In the future, Junieta hopes to make her business a success and sustainable.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, and rice

loans.name: Rolida

texts.en:
Rolida is 52 years old, married and has one child. 

Rolida is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Rolida requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Rolida has been raising pigs for two years now, and has borrowed 23 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Rolida would like to save enough money in order to support the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Gulshaiyr

texts.ru: Гулшайыр 65 лет, разведена, мать 4 детей. Гулшайыр имеет среднее образование, по характеру она спокойный и общительный человек. Гулшайыр, в поисках дополнительного источника дохода, в 1996 году начала заниматься разведением скота. Начав свой бизнес со стартовой суммы 3,000 сом (KGS). Гулшайыр приложила все усилия для развития своего бизнеса, на сегодняшний день в ее хозяйстве есть 3 коровы, 2 бычка, 3 лошади, 40 овец. Также есть надел мерою 4,82 ГА орошаемой земли. Для дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гулшайыр обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 130,000 сом (KGS) на покупку одной дойной коровы и бычка, часть кредита - примерно 30,000 сом (KGS) будет направлено на покупку корма для скота. В будущем, Гулшайыр планирует и дальше расширять свою деятельность.
texts.en:
Gulshaiyr is 65 and divorced with four children. She has a high school education and is by nature a relaxed and sociable person. In search of an additional source of income, she started a business raising livestock in 1996 with 3,000 KGS. She has put all her strength into developing her business and currently has three cows, two steers, three horses and 40 sheep as well as 4.82 hectares of irrigated land.

In order to further develop her business, Gulshaiyr has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 130,000 KGS to purchase a dairy cow and a steer as well as 30,000 KGS worth of livestock feed. In the future, she plans to further expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow, a steer and livestock feed

loans.name: Omar Antonio

texts.es:
Omar de 26 años de edad, hasta 6 grado de educación básica en la escuela de la comunidad. Su compañera de vida se dedica a vender en una pequeña tienda familiar y son padres de un hijo de 3 años de edad.

Omar hace unos años atrás se dedicaba solamente a los trabajos de la agricultura, pero hace 2 años está trabajando como albañil y motorista de maquinaria pesada para una empresa que ha comenzado a construir un complejo turístico en la zona aprovechando la cercanía con el mar, mientras él trabaja para esta empresa su esposa a tiende la tienda y el pequeño comedor que poseen donde la mayoría de sus clientes son los empleados del centro turístico. Él comienza a trabajar desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 4:00 pm  

El préstamo que está solicitando, es una parte para la cancelación de una deuda y el resto será invertido en la elaboración de un carretón para la venta de hot dog en la comunidad y de igual forma surtir más su tienda y comedor con productos de consumo básicos.

Sus planes principales son obtener éxito en su nuevo negocio en la venta de hot dog, de igual forma crecer en su tienda y aumentar los clientes para incrementar sus ventas y obtener mejores ganancias para responder con el compromiso creditico obtenido.
texts.en:
Omar, 26, studied a basic education up to sixth grade in the community school.  His life partner earns a living as a merchant in a small family store.  They're the parents of a 3-year-old.

A few years ago, Omar only worked in agriculture, but for two years he has been working in construction and as a heavy machine operator for a company that has started to build a tourist complex in the area to make the most of the proximity to the ocean.  While he works for this business, his wife tends the store and the small eatery they have.  The majority of their customers are the employees of the tourist center.  He works from 7 a.m. until 4 p.m.

The loan he's requesting is partly to repay a debt.  He'll invest the rest in making a cart to sell hot dogs in the community and in stocking his store and eatery with staple products.

Omar's main plan is to be successful in his new business selling hot dogs.  He also wants to grow in his store and expand his clientele to increase his sales and earn more profits to pay back his loan.

loans.use: to repay a debt, to build a hot dog cart, and to stock his store and eatery with staple products

loans.name: Martha Cecilia

texts.es: Cecilia es una señora divorciada,  tiene 40 años de edad y 3 hijos de 16, 19 y 20 años, de los mismos que los dos menores están estudiando y  el mayor de ellos salió del colegio y está trabajando para conseguir  algo de ingresos y con este dinero  cubrir los gastos que implica ingresar a la universidad, los mismos que no le pudo pagar su madre,  Cecilia trabaja de empleada domestica y también se dedica  a la crianza de animales menores, este crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de chanchos para mejorar su negocio y obtener ganancias que le permitan  pagar los estudios de sus hijos.
texts.en: Cecilia is divorced. She is 40 years old and has 3 children aged 16, 19 and 20 years old. Two of them are studying and the oldest has graduated from Secondary school and is working in order to make some income. He will use this money to cover the costs associated with entering university, which his mother cannot afford. Cecilia works as a domestic employee and also works raising small animals. This loan will be invested in the purchase of pigs to improve her business and generate revenues which will allow her to pay for her children's studies.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Sairakan

texts.ru: Сайракан успешно погасила предыдущий кредит, использовала его по назначению. Она очень благодарна Фонду Кива и всем инвесторам, помогшим ей с финансированием. На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве Сайракан есть 2 коровы, 10 овец и 1,23 ГА собственной земельной доли, где Сайракан выращивает подсолнечник, кукурузу и картофель для реализации.  В целях расширение своего хозяйства, Сайракан обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров. Доходы от кредита она планирует направить на дальнейшее развитие своей деятельности.
texts.en: Sairakan successfully repaid her previous loan, having used it as designated. She is very grateful to Kiva and all involved for having helped with her financing. Today Sairakan owns 2 cows, 10 sheep, and 1.23 hectares of land where she raises sunflowers, corn, and potatoes for sale. With the goal of further expanding her holdings Sairakan approached Bai-Tushum bank for a 60,000 som (KGS) loan to buy cows. She plans to direct income generated by this loan into further developing her business.

loans.use: To purchase cows in order to invest in her business

loans.name: Hường

texts.en:
Mrs. Hường has a retail business selling dry food. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

Hường is 43 years old and married with 2 children. She lives with her 2 dependants in Hau Loc district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2013, Hường joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Hường has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. 

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Hường hopes to build a new house, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Hamdani

texts.en:
Hamdani is married and lives with his wife and their only child in South Bogor, a suburban area that is located about two hours’ drive from Jakarta, the capital city. 

To support his family, Hamdani runs a small stall which sells snacks, drinks, mobile phone airtime, and bill payment services for his customers. Hamdani joined Ruma because he wanted to increase his income and expand his network. He is excited about his new business selling mobile phone airtime to his community. As the business runs, he hopes to get a working capital loan from Kiva in order to provide access to mobile services for his community by processing airtime transactions and processing bill payments on the weekends. Hamdani thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to provide mobile services in his community

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en:
Arlene is a 38-year-old married woman with one child. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Arlene has a charcoal retailing business in the Philippines. Arlene requested a PHP 13000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more stock of charcoal to sell.

Arlene has been in this business for five years. In the future, Arlene would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Meet Ahmad. Ahmad is single and he lives together with more than six family members in the family home. To support his family, Ahmad runs a small stall in his house selling mobile phone airtime for his customers.

Ahmad joined Ruma about a month ago because he wanted to increase his family's income. He feels really excited to expand his new business selling mobile phone airtime credits. As the business grows, he hopes to get a working capital loan from Kiva in order to provide access to mobile services for his community by processing airtime transactions on the weekends. 

Ahmad thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to provide mobile services in his community

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy soldering sticks, iron, and other things.

loans.name: Lợi

texts.en:
Lợi is 37 years old and she is married with 2 children. Lợi lives with 2 dependents in Hau Loc district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Lợi's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.  Lợi has a retail business selling clothes. She has been involved in this business for 7 years.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Lợi hopes her business will do well so that her family can be healthy and happy, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Lan

texts.en:
Mrs. Lan has a retail business selling incense and ghost money.

Lan is 55 years old and she is married with 4 children. Lan lives in Hau Loc district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Lan's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. Lan has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

With the profits from her business Lan hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.en:
At the age of 60, Veronica is still single. She lives at Dilasag, Aurora. As a single person, she supports the education of her nephew. 

She gets her income by selling second-hand or used clothes. Her highest income from the business in a monthly basis is Php20,000 during the peak season. She used that as her rolling capital to further increase her income. 

Veronica now needs Php15,000 as additional capital because she wants to buy a stock of second-hand clothes for her customers to have more choices. With that, Veronica hopes that Kiva lenders will grant her loan request.

loans.use: to buy a stock of second-hand clothes

loans.name: Thủy

texts.en:
Mr. Thủy works in agriculture, raising marine aquaculture. Thủy has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

He is 42 years old and he is married with three children. Thủy lives with three dependents in Hau Loc district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Thủy's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.

The main hardship that Thủy faces in his life is not having clean water syterm and a hygienic latrine. He is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, and brick to build toilet.

In the future, Thủy hopes for his business to do well, for his family to be healthy and happy, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and bricks to build a toilet

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase three cows in order to increase the headcount of livestock on his farm

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 32 years old and married with two children; both of them are in school. Jocelyn works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase an additional stock of groceries to sell.

Jocelyn has been in this business for seven years, and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, canned goods, and other groceries. 

In the future Jocelyn would like to save enough money so she can continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase an additional stock of groceries

loans.name: Thanh

texts.en:
Mr. Thanh works in agriculture, raising marine aquaculture. Thanh has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

Thanh is 42 years old, and he is married with two children. He lives with two dependents in Hau Loc district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Thanh's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns him is not having a clean water system and a hygienic latrine. He is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, and bricks to build a toilet.

With his business profit, Thanh hopes for his business to do well, for his family to be healthy and happy, and for his children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and bricks to build a toilet

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda owns and operates a tricycle unit. She has been successful in this business for many years, and has repaid her previous loan used for the business. She also finds ways to improve her income to provide for her family's everyday needs and necessities.

She would like to get a new loan to buy spare parts and accessories for their vehicle. She is requesting an amount of 10,000 PHP for the maintenance of the tricycle and to pay for the renewal of the franchise agreement / permit so she can continue to operate her business.

In the future, Erlinda wants to buy another tricycle for the business. She hopes to improve their general living conditions and give her children a good, quality education. She meets with her co-fellowship members* every week, to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God that she studies.

*All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for spare parts and maintenance on her motorized tricycle unit.

loans.name: Thơ

texts.en:
Mrs. Thơ has a retail business selling dry food. Thơ has been involved in her business for more than 10 years. She is 59 years old and married with three children. Thơ lives with two dependents in Hau Loc district, a rural town in Thanh Hoá province. One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a clean water system and hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

This is Thơ first loan with Thanh Hoá Fund of Poor Women. In the future, Thơ hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Sonya

texts.ru: Соня успешно погасила предыдущий кредит и использовала его по назначению. Она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве Сони есть 2 коровы и 20 овец, также на участке мерою 1,40 Га она выращивает кукурузу, подсолнечник и картофель для реализации. Ежемесячный доход Сони составляет 20,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение поголовья скота за счет покупки одной коровы. Доходы от кредита Соня вложит в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, она хочет накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Sonya successfully repaid her last loan after using it as planned. She is grateful to Kiva and all involved in her financing. Today her farm includes two cows and 20 sheep, as well as 1.40 hectares of land where she raises corn, sunflowers, and potatoes for sale. Sonya's monthly income is around 20,000 som (KGS). In order the further develop her business she contacted Bai-Tushum bank for a 50,000 som (KGS) loan to increase the number of livestock she has by buying a cow. Sonya plans to invest income generated by the loan into further expanding her herd, and she also wants to save money for house repairs.

loans.use: to buy one cow in order to increase her livestock herd.

loans.name: Nurgul

texts.ru: Нургул 45 лет, замужем, 3 детей. У Нургул высшее образование, работает учителем английского языка в школе. На протяжении многих лет в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи занимается разведением скота. У Нургул в хозяйстве есть 2 коровы, 2 бычка и 10 овец. Нургул известна, как принципиальный, честный, порядочный и надежный человек. На сегодняшний день ее деятельность приносит ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 6,000 сом (KGS). Для дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Нургул обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 110,000 сом (KGS) на покупку двух лошадей. Доходы от кредита она планирует использовать для развития своего хозяйства и намерена в будущем купить квартиру.
texts.en: Nurgul is 45 years old, married, and has three children. Nurgul has a college education, and works as an english teacher in a school. For many years she has earned extra income for her family by raising livestock. Nurgul owns two cows, two steers, and ten sheep. She is considered a principled, honest, respectable, and reliable person. She currently earns about 6,000 som (KGS) per month. To further develop her farm Nurgul contacted the Bai-Tushum Bank for a 110,000 som (KGS) loan to buy two horses. She plans to use the income generated from the loan to develop her farm, and she also plans to buy an apartment in the future.

loans.use: to purchase two horses in order to invest in her business

loans.name: Carmen Amelia

texts.es: Carmen es madre soltera, ella tiene 44 años, en total tiene 5 hijos pero solo 2 viven con ella y están estudiando, Carmen se dedica a la crianza y comercio de animales para mantener   y educar a sus hijos, el dinero del crédito lo va a invertir en la compra  de chanchas para tenerlas de reproductoras y  comenta que  ahí es más rentable  su negocio ya que vende las crías que son los chanchitos pequeñitos, la aspiración de Carmen es aumentar más animalitos e incrementarlos en su negocio, mejorar sus ingresos y tener el dinero para cubrir por lo menos lo mas indispensable que son los gastos de educación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Carmen is a 44-year-old single mother. She has 5 children but only 2 live with her and they are currently studying. Carmen works raising and trading animals to sustain and educate her kids. The money of the loan will be used to buy reproductive pigs. She says that in this way her business is more profitable since she sells the small pigs. 

Carmen’s aspiration is to increase the amount of animals she has in her business, improve her incomes and have enough money to pay for at least the most essential expenses, which are her sons’ education.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.ru: Светлана, 53 года, вдова, есть дочь. Светлана на протяжении 9 лет занимается разведением скота и полеводством, на сегодняшний день у нее есть 4 дойные коровы, 4 нетели и 3 бычка, также выращивает клевер. Средства от перепродажи скота и молока - единственный источник пропитания и дохода для семьи Светланы. Этих средств не хватает на достойную жизнь и содержание семьи. А ведь еще нужно расширять свой бизнес. В связи с приближающимся зимним периодом, Светлана хочет закупить сено для скота, поэтому она обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS). Это позволит Светлане сохранить и приумножить поголовье скота. В будущем, она мечтает сделать дома ремонт.
texts.en: Svetlana is 53 years old, a widow, and has a daughter. For the past 9 years she has raised livestock and farmed, and today she owns four milk cows, four heifers, and three steers, and also grows clover. Selling milk and animals provides the sole source of income for her family, and it is not enough to support the family at an acceptable level. She needs to expand her business farther. Because of the nearing winter season Svetlana wants to buy hay for the livestock, so she contacted Bai-Tushum for a 50,000 som (KGS) loan. This will allow Svetlana to keep and grow her livestock herd. In the future, she dreams of renovating her home.

loans.use: To purchase hay as a feed for cattle in order to expand her business

loans.name: Nhóm 15 Thôn 10 Quảng Hải Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Tình is 22 years old and she is married with one child. Tình lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoá province.

Mrs. Tình works in agriculture raising poultry. Tình has been involved in her business for five years. The main hardship that Tình faces in her business is a lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in the future. This is Tình first loan with Thanh Hoá Fund for Poor Women. With her business profit, Tình hopes for her family to be healthy and happy and for her business to do well.

Tình is the group leader of the Nhóm 15 Thôn 10 Quảng Hải solidarity group, which consists of six members.

loans.use: to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: Rosa Elvia

texts.es: Rosa es una señora responsable que vive en el campo y se dedica al jornal de trabajo en el campo y a la crianza de animales, Rosa es madre soltera, tiene 45 años y sus 2 hijos  tienen 24 y 13 años mismos de los cuales el menor asiste a la escuela, y pos otra parte el mayor dejo sus estudios por falta de recursos económicos, Rosa va a invertir el crédito en la compra de terneros para tenerlos en hierba por la que paga arriendo, Rosa comenta que  se esfuerza  mucho en su trabajo y negocio para cubrir los gastos de alimentación, salud y vestido suyos y  de sus hijos y que aspira que su hijo menor llegue a ser un profesional.
texts.en:
Rosa is a responsible lady who lives in the countryside, works the land and raises animals. Rosa is a 45-year-old single mother and has 2 children, ages 24 and 13. The youngest kid goes to school and the older one had to drop his studies due to the lack of financial resources. 

Rosa will use this loan to buy calves to have them in the field for which she pays rent. She says she puts a lot of effort in her work and business to pay for hers and her sons’ food, health and clothes. She hopes her youngest son will become a professional.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Yoni

texts.es:
La socia Yony se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de ropa y negocio de venta de muebles, la socia vende pantalones, blusas y polos, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un bazar. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar zapatos, polos, chompas, polos y blusas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Yoni still works selling clothing and furniture. She sells trousers, blouses and sweatshirts. She has had the business for several years and it is doing very well. Her dream is to own a store. She is requesting a loan to buy shoes, sweatshirts, sweaters and blouses.

Yoni is happy about receiving the loan and is committed to making her loan repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy shoes, sweatshirts, sweaters, and blouses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in his business, as he wants to buy a bigger quantity and variety of animals.

loans.name: Segundo Rafael

texts.es: A sus 30 años de edad Segundo tiene un hijo de 13 años al que quiere y cuida mucho, ya que cuenta que la madre del niño lo dejo viviendo con Segundo, son 10 años que se dedica a la elaboración de juegos infantiles, el aprendió a esta actividad ya que primero trabajo de empleado y al ver que era rentable hace 3 años decidió ponerse su negocio propio, y es por esto que el crédito lo va a invertir en  la compra de materiales y madera para elaborar  estos juegos, lo que Segundo aspira es mejorar su negocio ya que tiene mucha creatividad y así conseguir más clientela y que sus ingresos mejoren para darle  a sus hijo lo necesario para que siga estudiando y que por cierto es buen estudiante.
texts.en: Segundo, 30, has a 13-year old son who he loves very much.  The two have lived together since the boy's mother left them several years ago.  Segundo has been a toy-maker for 10 years.  He learned the business from a former employer, saw that it was profitable and set up his own business 3 years ago.  He is applying for a loan that he will use to buy the supplies he needs to carry on the business.  For the future, Segundo wants to expand his business.  He's a creative guy and, consequently, has many customers.  This investment will allow him to increase his income and, in turn, ensure that his son--an excellent student--can continue his studies.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his toys business.

loans.name: Las Vencedoras Group

texts.es:
Las Vencedoras es un grupo solidario integrado por cuatro microempresarias exitosas, es coordinado por la señora Leyla quien tiene la edad de 28 años, acompañada y madre de dos hijos, quienes han sido su mayor fuerza para su superación es propietaria de una mini pulpería, además comercializa ropa y cosméticos AVON en su domicilio y en el mercado de la municipalidad, es el octavo ciclo que solicita los financiamiento en la institución para su negocio, asegura que los beneficios han sido múltiples uno de ellos es la diversificación de los productos ofrecidos, aunque existen temporada bajas se mantiene con los productos ofrecidos en su mini pulpería, pues comercializa los productos que más demanda tienen por parte de la población, siendo este el que le permite obtener ingresos a diario, por tal razón desea invertir en productos como arroz, azúcar, aceite, papel higiénico Scott, papel higiénico Nevax, tollas sanitarias, gaseosas, jugos Del Valle, Tampico, Tropical, chiverías, cosméticos como vanidades, perfumes para damas, perfumes para caballeros, rubores, pinturas labiales, camisetas, blusas, jean Kalu, Lee, Big Time, blúmer, tobilleras, brazier, etc., su meta es llegar a tener una pulpería más surtida donde ofrezca mayor variedad de productos. 
El resto de los integrantes son las señoras Ángela quien tiene la edad de 39 años y comercializa ropa y lácteos en su comunidad, Sara tiene la edad de 36 años y es propietaria de una pulpería en su domicilio y María de los Dolores de 49 años de edad propietaria de una pulpería desde hace dos años.
texts.en:
Las Vencedoras is a solidarity group made up of four successful microentrepreneur. The group is coordinated by Señora Leyla, who is 28 years old and has a partner and two children. They have been her greatest motivation to succeed. She owns a small grocery store, and sells clothing and Avon cosmetics in her home and the local market.

This is the eighth cycle that she is requesting a loan from the organisation for her business.She says that there have been multiple benefits, including the diversification of the products she offers. Even though there are periods of low demand, she is able to stay afloat with the products she offers in her small grocery store. This is because she sells the products that are most in demand by the community, which allows her to make money every day. It is for this reason that she wants to invest in products such as rice, oil, Scott toilet paper, Nevax toilet paper, sanitary towels, fizzy drinks, Del Valle, Tampico, and Tropical juices, snacks, cosmetics, perfume, eau de cologne, makeup, t-shirts, blouses, Kalu, Lee, and Big Time jeans, underwear, anklets, etc. 

Her goal is to have a better-stocked store where she can offer a greater variety of products.

The other members of the group are Señora Ángela, who is 39 and sells clothing and dairy products in her community, Señora Sara, who is 36 and owns a grocery store in her home, and Señora María de los Dolores, who is 49 and has owned a grocery store for two years.

loans.use: to buy clothing, basic grains and cosmetics.

loans.name: Sineat

texts.en: Sineat is 21 years old and is currently studying banking and finance at a university. She lives with her widowed father, an old grandma and two siblings in Tbong Khmum province of Cambodia. Due to a shortage of finances, she decided to request a loan to pay for her tuition fees. This loan will help her graduate. In the future, she wants to find a good job to support her family.

loans.use: to pay for her tuition fees

loans.name: Nhóm 16 Thôn 8 Quảng Hải Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Truyền operates a food stall selling fish. Truyền  has been involved in this business for eight years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is a lack of capital. She is applying for a loan to purchase fish to resell. With her business profit, Truyền hopes for her family to be healthy and happy and for her business to do well. She wants to make enough money to provide for her kids.

Truyền is 26 years old and she is married with one child.

In 2013, Truyền joined Thanh Hoá Fund for Poor Women (FPW) to improve her business. Truyền has successfully repaid two loans from FPW. Truyền is the group leader of the Nhóm 16 Thôn 8 Quảng Hải solidarity group, which consists of four members.

loans.use: to purchase fish to resell

loans.name: Maria Josefa

texts.es:
María Josefa tiene 46 años de edad, vive en el Caserio de Carrasquillo junto a su esposo e hijos, tiene hijos mayores quienes se dedican a la agricultura y al comercio. La comunidad se dedica a la comercialización de granos, crianza de ganado y a la agriculutra, la comunidad es rural y está ubciada en el distrito de Buenos Aires, provincia de Morropón, región de Piura, costa norte de Perú.

La actividad que desarrolla María Josefa es la venta de cerveza, chicha, crianza de animales, esposo se dedica a la agricultura siembra y comercialización de maiz además de la pesca artesanal en la zona. María Josefa es natural de la zona y tiene varios años de experiencia en el rubro de picanteria y en la agricultura. Ella solicita crédito para invertir en la construcción de su casa y en la cosecha del maiz de su esposo. Lo que le permitirá obtener una mejora en su calidad de vida y también para toda su familia.
texts.en:
Maria Josefa is 46 years old and lives in Caserio de Carrasquillo with her husband and children. She also has adult children who are dedicated to agriculture and commerce. The community commercializes grain, cattle-raising and agriculture. It's a rural community located in Buenos Aires district, Morropon province, in the Piura region of Peru's north coast.

Maria's Josefa's economic activity includes selling beer and chicha [a homemade corn beer], and raising animals. Her husband is dedicated to agriculture; he plants and sells corn and artisan fish in the area. Maria Josefa is a native of the zone with various years of experience in agriculture and growing spicy crops. She is requesting this loan to invest in the construction of her house and her husband's corn harvest. This will permit her to improve her quality of life and, also, that of her family.

loans.use: invest in house construction and in harvesting her husband's corn.
